62b7(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
63a1(mdo sde): thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/
63a2(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di dag go /de la pha rol tu phyin pa de dag yang dag par brjod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i rlom sems med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rgyun mi 'chad
63a3(mdo sde): par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar mi byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi rlom sems med pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshul khrims dang / bslab pa
63a4(mdo sde): dang | sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa thams cad la mi 'jug pa'ang ma yin no/ /bzod pa'i rlom sems med pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rtag tu bzod
63a5(mdo sde): pa dang / des pa la'ang mi 'jug pa ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi rlom sems med pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag
63a6(mdo sde): par mi sgrub pa'ang ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi rlom sems med pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rtag tu nges par sems pa lhur mi len pa'ang ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi
63a7(mdo sde): rlom sems med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rtag tu thos pa tshol ba la mngon par mi brtson pa'ang ma yin no/ /thabs kyi rlom sems med pas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin
63b1(mdo sde): pa ste| mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bya ba'i rtsom pa rnams ni mi snang ba'ang ma yin no/ /smon lam gyi rlom sems med pas
63b2(mdo sde): smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi sgo rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na
63b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo ba'ang ma yin no/ /stobs kyi rlom sems med pas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ sred med kyi bu dang / lag na rdo rje'i
63b4(mdo sde): gzugs rnams kyi nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas khengs pa'i sems can rnams mi 'dul ba'ang ma yin no/ /ye shes kyi rlom sems med pas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
63b5(mdo sde): pa ste| bzo'i gnas dang / sbyor ba'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas thams cad la mi 'jug pa'ang ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
63b6(mdo sde): pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'o/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ rnam par smin pa la'ang re ba med la/ rnam pa thams cad kyis dngos po thams cad yongs su
63b7(mdo sde): gtong ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang / tshul khrims la'ang rnam par mi rtog la srog gi phyir yang bslab pa mi 'dral ba dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid kyang yin la gnod sems
64a1(mdo sde): kyi thab dang / zhe sdang yang mi skyed pa dang / 'dod pa'ang med la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rtsom pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'ang med la bsam gtan dang /
64a2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa'ang kun tu tshol ba dang / chos thams cad la the tshom yang med la thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'ang kun tu tshol ba dang / chos thams cad
64a3(mdo sde): don du gnyer ba'ang med la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs thams cad la'ang dmigs pa dang / sems gang la'ang mi gnas la smon lam thams cad kyang mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
64a4(mdo sde): nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa'ang bcom la sra ba rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i lus kyang sgrub pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyang shes la slob dpon dang / bla ma thams cad kyang
64a5(mdo sde): kun tu tshol ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'o/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ sbyin pa la
64a6(mdo sde): yang dga' la sems can ser sna can dang mthun par yang 'jug pa dang / tshul khrims la'ang dga' la sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba dang mthun par 'jug pa dang /
64a7(mdo sde): bzod pa la'ang dga' la sems can gnod sems can sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang mthun par 'ang 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus la'ang dga' la sems can le lo can brtson
64b1(mdo sde): 'grus chung ba brtson 'grus nyams pa dang mthun par 'ang 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan la'ang dga' la sems can bya ba mang pos g.yengs pa sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang mthun
64b2(mdo sde): par 'ang 'jug pa dang / shes rab la'ang dga' la sems can blun pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can rtag tu ma dad pa dang mthun par 'jug pa dang / thabs la'ang dga' la bya ba
64b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang don du mi gnyer ba dang / smon lam la'ang dga' la sems can 'khor bas mus phyung ba dang mthun par 'jug pa dang / stobs la'ang dga' la sems can nyam chung ba
64b4(mdo sde): mthu med pa dang mthun par yang 'jug pa dang / ye shes la'ang dga' la sems can 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dang mthun par 'ang 'jug pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
64b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'o/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ni lag na
64b6(mdo sde): rin po che dang / nam mkha'i mdzod 'thob bo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni ngan song thams cad las shin tu 'da' ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / cang shes pa'i
64b7(mdo sde): sems 'thob bo/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/ blta bas mi ngoms pa 'thob bo/ /brtson 'grus
65a1(mdo sde): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni mngon par shes pa myur ba dang / chos thams cad la dbang byed pa 'thob bo/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni lus dang /
65a2(mdo sde): sems yid du 'ong ba dang / gzungs dang / spobs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba 'thob bo/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang
65a3(mdo sde): dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob bo/ /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni bya sla ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa 'thob bo/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni
65a4(mdo sde): skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran pa dang / ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur ba 'thob bo/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni nyon mongs pa thams
65a5(mdo sde): cad dang / bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa 'thob bo/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni phung po dang /
65a6(mdo sde): 'chi bdag dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'das pa 'thob ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu
65a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'o/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba'ang yin la sbyin pas dag go snyam du'ang mi snyems
65b1(mdo sde): so/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi bsngags pa smra
65b2(mdo sde): ba'ang yin la ye shes kyis dag go snyam du'ang mi snyems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag thams cad ni yang dag par bsgrubs nas spang bar bya'o/ /'di dag thams cad ni yongs su
65b3(mdo sde): brtags pa las byung ba'o/ /de bas na gang yongs su rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'i chos de dag ni spang bar bya'o/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su rtog pa dang /
65b4(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis dag go snyam du mi snyems te/ gzhan du na rnam par mi rtog pa spros pa med pa'i yul gyis ye shes thob nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs
65b5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di chos gang gis tshig bla dwags/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ces bya ba
65b6(mdo sde): 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa/ spros pa med pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de la ngar 'dzin pa'i spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/ /
65b7(mdo sde): nga yir 'dzin pa'i spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/ nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/ /rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyun gyi spros pa ni byang chub
66a1(mdo sde): ma yin te/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyun nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/ /ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims
66a2(mdo sde): dang | gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
66a3(mdo sde): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/ /lta ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / smon lam gyi spros pa ni byang chub ma yin te/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
66a4(mdo sde): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa ni byang chub bo/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni byang chub bo/ /chos thams cad ni byang chub ma yin no/ /smras pa/
66a5(mdo sde): rnam grangs gang gis na chos thams cad ni byang chub yin la/ chos thams cad byang chub kyang ma yin/ smras pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
66a6(mdo sde): nyid khong du chud pa ni byang chub bo/ /chos thams cad la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa ni byang chub ma yin no/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ces
66a7(mdo sde): bya ba de ni nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /nye bar zhi zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid
66b1(mdo sde): ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dwags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dwags te/ stong pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag go /smras pa/ gang
66b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / 'di skad du/ chos thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes gsungs te/ de bas na chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag go /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/
66b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji ltar khong du chud pa bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag go /smras pa/ gang 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad ni skye'o//
66b4(mdo sde): 'gag go zhes gsungs na/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ci las dgongs te gsungs/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gnas pa skye ba dang / 'gag pa la mngon par chags pas de la de
66b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten dngang ba'i gnas bsal ba'i phyir tha snyad kyi dbang gis skye'o/ /'gag go zhes gsungs te/ 'di la chos gang yang skye ba dang / 'gag pa
66b6(mdo sde): med do/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas shes par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes par bya/ sems can rnams shes par bya/ sems can gyi chos
66b7(mdo sde): rnams shes par bya/ bdag shes par bya/ bdag gi chos rnams shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis de'i tshe don de nyid tshigs
67a1(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas/ /sangs rgyas 'byung dang sangs rgyas dang / /sangs rgyas chos dang de dag ni/ /rang
67a2(mdo sde): bzhin ci 'dra rab tu shes/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhyen mchog ni/ /zad med dge ba'i phung po ste/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis 'byung / /sngon gyi 'du byed rgyu las skye/ /
67a3(mdo sde): gang gis sangs rgyas rnams rtogs pa/ /dpa' bo de ni pha rol phyin/ /des ni thams cad yongs su shes/ /des ni thams cad khong du chud/ /byang chub sus kyang ma byin te/ /gang gis
67a4(mdo sde): kyang ni gzungs pa med/ /bdag gi chos rnams yongs shes pas/ /sangs rgyas la ni sangs rgyas brjod/ /gang gis bdag ni rang bzhin gyis/ /'du shes tsam du rnam rig pa/ /de
67a5(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas ci 'dra dang / /byang chub rang bzhin ci 'dra shes/ /'gro ba thams cad 'du shes tsam/ /yongs su rtog pa rnams kyis brjod/ /rmi lam sgyu ma la sogs mtshan/ /byang
67a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas rnam par rig / ji ltar tshul 'di shes 'gyur zhes/ /gang zhig de snyam sems 'gyur na/ /dbang po'i rta rnams rab btul ba/ /mnyam bzhag des ni rab tu
67a7(mdo sde): shes| |de la dgra dang zin med de/ /dgos pa dang ni mi dgos med/ /dor ba med cing gzung ba med/ /yang dag chos brjod 'di 'dra'o/ /chos rnams kun la yang dag tshig /
67b1(mdo sde): chos rnams yang dag brjod ces bya/ /de dag yang dag tshig min pa/ /de ni skyon chags chos zhes brjod/ /'dod chags chos dang 'dod med ni/ /dag pa rnams kyis mnyam par mthong / /de
67b2(mdo sde): bzhin zhe sdang gti mug ste/ /'di ni chos rnams yang dag brjod/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid go bgos pa/ /gang zhig rang bzhin stong min pa/ /sems can rab tu
67b3(mdo sde): mi mthong ste/ /de ltar chos nyid gang shes shing / /rtag tu kun tu dri med la/ /'jigs med thang la phyin de dag /sangs rgyas khong du chud par 'gyur/ /dper na sgyu ma mkhan po zhig /sprul pa
67b4(mdo sde): thar bar bya phyir brtson/ /des ni snga nas de shes pas/ /sprul pa de la chags pa med/ /srid gsum sprul pa 'dra bar ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pas shes/ /'gro ba'i ched du go bgos
67b5(mdo sde): te| |'gro ba de ltar snga nas shes/ /bdag ni yang dag ma yin zhing / /sems can rang bzhin stong par mthong / /kun tu song ba'i chos mthong nas/ /bzod pa thob ste thang la gnas/ /gang du'ang
67b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa ma yin te/ /gang nas kyang ni ldog med pa/ /de ni 'jug med ldog med de/ /thang la gnas pa'i bram ze'o/ /nam zhig bsam pa mnyam pa yis/ /yang dag chos kyi dbyings la gnas//
67b7(mdo sde): de tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur lung ston/ /nam zhig bdag ni ji lta bar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas lung bstan dag /mthong ba'i dri ma bor ba ni/ /rgyal ba
68a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis lung ston to/ /sgrib pa med pa'i dbyings gnas nas/ /de nas mya ngan 'das la spyod/ /snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid ni/ /kun tu kha na ma tho med/ /
68a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gang / /chos rnams yang dag brjod 'dod cing / /yang dag chos brjod don gnyer de/ /yang dag chos brjod 'di bgrod do/ /sems can chen po des tshigs
68a3(mdo sde): su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu brgyad stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang
68a4(mdo sde): bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/ //bam po bzhi pa/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis byang chub sems dpa'
68a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpas ni bden pa gces su bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ bden pa yang dag par brjod
68a6(mdo sde): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yang dag par brjod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la bden pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
68a7(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas sems de srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi 'dor zhing sems can rnams la log par yang mi sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'o/ /gang byang
68b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ phyis sems de 'dor zhing sems can thams cad la log par sgrub pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
68b2(mdo sde): rab tu smad pa'i brdzun du smra ba'o/ /smras pa/ ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sems de phyis yongs su mi 'dor zhing sems can thams cad
68b3(mdo sde): la log par mi sgrub pa yin/ smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal gyi bden pa shes shing / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa
68b4(mdo sde): shes pa na de sems de yongs su mi 'dor zhing sems can thams cad la'ang log par mi sgrub pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' bden pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa
68b5(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog go / smras pa/ sdug bsngal ni gang shes pa ni ji lta bu/ smras pa/ len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par
68b6(mdo sde): smin pa ni sdug bsngal te/ 'di ni sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/ /nam sdug bsngal de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / stong pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / bdag dang / bdag gi dang bral
68b7(mdo sde): pa shes pa 'di ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ /nam sdug bsngal de kun 'byung ba tsam dang / rdzas med pa dang / rdzas ma yin pa dang / snying po med pa dang / bdag po med par
69a1(mdo sde): mthong ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/ /nam sdug bsngal de sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang ma 'ongs/ phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/ da ltar byung ba la'ang mi
69a2(mdo sde): gnas te/ thog ma med pa can yin la/ rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa/ rang bzhin gyis dben par shes pa 'di ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ rigs
69a3(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'gog pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dwags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'gog pa ni cir yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te 'gog pa ni cir yang brjod
69a4(mdo sde): par bya ba ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir 'gog pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyi sgrib pa med pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa/ yod pa ma yin pa/ kun brtags
69a5(mdo sde): pa ste| nam yang dag pa ma yin pa de la kun tu mi rtog pa de ni 'gog pa zhes bya'o/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog par 'gag pa na chos gang yang 'jig par mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir
69a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni shin tu 'gags pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed do/ /byang chub
69a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ci las dgongs te gsungs/ smras
69b1(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu/ mngon sum du byed ces bya ba 'di ni bstan du med pa/ mngon sum du mthong ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'gog pa ni bstan du med pa'i chos so zhes
69b2(mdo sde): gsungs so/ /chos gang bstan du med pa de ni mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so/ /de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed mi mthong ngo zhes gsungs
69b3(mdo sde): te| de la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed do/ /nyan thos ni chos la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i blos 'gog pa mngon sum du byed do/ /gnas so/ /kun shes so
69b4(mdo sde): zhes gsungs so/ /dmigs pa dang / yid la byed pa gang dag gis 'di ltar shes/ 'di ltar mthong / 'di ltar nges par byed pa 'di ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/
69b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni bar 'dzin pa'o/ /nga yir 'dzin pa de'i rgyu dang bcas par gang 'byung ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /nam de'i 'byung ba'i chos gang yang so sor nges pa ma yin par
69b6(mdo sde): mthong ba 'di ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang de ltar rnam par mthong zhing tshol ba 'di ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ gang snyems pa de ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /
69b7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis snyems pa'i rang bzhin ni sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so/ /snyems pa ni thams cad tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ /de bas na
70a1(mdo sde): snyems pa kun 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/ /sdug bsngal med pa ni 'gog pa'o/ /ye shes gang gi snyems pa de la mi snyems pa de ni lam mo/ /rigs
70a2(mdo sde): kyi bu| bdag gi bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa shes pa bstan pa 'di'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /bden pa bstan pa 'di bshad
70a3(mdo sde): pa na byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa khong du chud do/ /bar snang la gnas pa'i lha'i bu mo stong phrag bcu ni chos rnams la chos kyi
70a4(mdo sde): mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
70a5(mdo sde): rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gang / dran pa ni gang / dran pa'i gnas ni gang / de skad ces smras pa dang /
70a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
70a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad la mi skye bar shes pa dran pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mi skye ba shes pa'i smon lam can yin te/ de dag gi dran pa de'ang
70b1(mdo sde): mi skye ba shes pas yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ thams cad tu mi bskyod pa/ drang ba/ mi g.yo ba/ gting dang / 'gram mi rtogs pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
70b2(mdo sde): cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa gang gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun 'dzin pa'i dran pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
70b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum mo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa de ni 'di 'dra'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa de'i gnas ni rnam pa bcu ste/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag
70b4(mdo sde): pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
70b5(mdo sde): chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / gtong ba
70b6(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste/ 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bcu'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
70b7(mdo sde): lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar lus 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' nas ma 'ongs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi 'gro /sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
71a1(mdo sde): mtha' la mi gnas te/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log las byung ba/ byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa/ thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus med
71a2(mdo sde): pa| rtsa ba gnas pa med pa/ bdag po med pa/ nga yi ba med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ tshogs zhes bya ba dang / lus zhes bya ba dang / longs spyod ces bya ba dang / gnas
71a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / skye mched ces bya ba ni glo bur gyi tha snyad rnams kyis tha snyad tu btags pa'o/ /lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ pha ma'i khu ba dang / khrag las
71a4(mdo sde): byung ba/ mi gtsang ba/ rul ba/ rang bzhin gyis dri mi zhim pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pa dang / sgyid lugs pa'i rkun pos dkrugs pa/
71a5(mdo sde): rtag tu 'jig pa/ 'brul pa/ 'bral ba/ rnam par 'thor ba/ rnam par 'joms pa'i chos can/ nad tha dad pa brgya stong gi tshang ngo snyam du lus la dran pa nye bar 'jog go /
71a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar lus 'di ni rkang pa dang / rkang sor dang / byin pa dang / brla dang / gru do dang / lto ba dang / lte ba dang / sgal tshigs
71a7(mdo sde): dang / snying dang / rtsi ba logs dang / rtsib ma dang / lag pa'i thal mo dang / dpung ba dang / thal gong dang / mgrin pa dang / 'gram pa dang / dpral ba dang / mgo'i
71b1(mdo sde): thod pa 'dus pa tsam ste/ las 'byung ba'i byed pas bsags pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa brgya stong gi gnas so/ /'di ni
71b2(mdo sde): rdzas mang po 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ skra dang / spu dang / se mo dang / so dang / rus pa dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / lus dang / rgyus pa dang / tshil dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / mcher
71b3(mdo sde): ba dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / pho ba dang / long ka dang / khrag dang / ngar snabs dang / mkhris pa dang / rnag dang / mchil ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas rnams te/ de de ltar
71b4(mdo sde): rdzas mang po 'dus pa yin na/ de la lus zhes ji skad du bya snyam du lus la dran pa nye bar 'jog go /de la so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ lus 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs so snyam
71b5(mdo sde): nas de lus la nam mkha' ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog go / de thams cad nam mkha' ltar mthong ngo / /de lus yongs su shes par bya ba las gang la'ang dran pa mi 'jug go /mi ldog go /mi
71b6(mdo sde): 'jug mi ldog pas dran pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar dran pa la gnas pa ni 'di ltar lus ji lta ba byang chub kyang de bzhin du shes te/ 'di la thogs par bya ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir
71b7(mdo sde): zhe na| gang du thogs pa de thams cad ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba dran pa nye
72a1(mdo sde): bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ tshor ba zhes bya ba ni khong du chud pa ste/ reg pa de'ang phyin ci log dang / phyin
72a2(mdo sde): ci ma log pa dang / de gnyi ga las rnam par grol ba'o snyam mo/ /de la byis pa so so'i skye bo sems g.yengs pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyi tshor ba ni phyin ci log ste/ de dag ni mi
72a3(mdo sde): rtag pa la rtag par tshor ro/ /sdug bsngal ba la bde bar tshor ro/ /bdag med pa la bdag tu tshor ro/ /mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar tshor te/ 'di ni phyin ci log gi tshor ba'o/ /gang mi
72a4(mdo sde): rtag pa la mi rtag par tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag med par tshor ba dang / mi gtsang ba la mi gtsang bar tshor ba 'di ni nyan thos
72a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshor ba'o/ /gang mi rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa yang ma yin par tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba dang /
72a6(mdo sde): bdag med pa la bdag med pa dang / bdag med pa'ang ma yin par tshor ba dang / mi gtsang ba la mi gtsang ba dang / mi gtsang ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba 'di ni byang chub sems
72a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshor ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba ni tshor ba po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de mi mthong bas tshor ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de
72b1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dus byas thams cad ni tshor ba'o zhes gsungs so/ /gal te 'dus byas thams cad tshor ba ma yin na ni 'di la tshor ba po zhes bya ba ci
72b2(mdo sde): zhig yod/ tshor ba ni tshor bar byed pa ma yin/ tshor bar bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / tshor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus byas tshor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus byas dang /
72b3(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas las rnam par grol ba'i tshor bar byed pa gang yang med de/ de ltar tshor ba de dag tshor ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /'di la tshor bas rtsol ba gang yang yang
72b4(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ byang chub ji lta ba tshor ba'ang de bzhin du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /de la
72b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang tshor ba de ni sems tsam mo/ /sems de'ang gnas pa med pa/
72b6(mdo sde): gzung ba med pa/ lus med pa'o/ /gang gnas med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ lus med pa de'i gnas ji lta bu zhig yod snyam mo/ /sems kyis sems mi shes so/ /sems kyis sems
72b7(mdo sde): mi mthong ngo / /gang la brten nas byung ba'i sems de'ang gzhan la rag las pa/ rang dbang med par mthong ngo / /sems ma gtogs par byang chub kyang mi shes so/ /de la byang chub sems
73a1(mdo sde): tsam du shes pas sems la dbang thob bo/ /de sems la dbang bas theg pa chen po la dbang byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la'ang sems snyoms
73a2(mdo sde): pa dang / theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos dran pa
73a3(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/
73a4(mdo sde): zag pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos sam/ chos gang dang / gang
73a5(mdo sde): la dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de shin tu bzung ba/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ shin tu bsags pa'am/ shin tu chub pa/ rang gi kha na las pa/ shin tu dbang byed pa'i dran
73a6(mdo sde): pa des skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa mnyam par byed de/ gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa las rnam par grol ba dang / gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las rnam
73a7(mdo sde): par grol ba dang / gang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las rnam par grol ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de 'di snyam du sems te/
73b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/ dben pa'i rang bzhin can/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin can/ chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med pa ste/ nam
73b2(mdo sde): mkha'i rang bzhin can/ chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ chos thams cad ni rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid de/ nyon
73b3(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa'i rang bzhin can/ chos thams cad ni smra ba med pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin can/ chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa ste/ 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin can/ chos
73b4(mdo sde): thams cad ni grangs med pa ste/ grangs thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad ni drang ba ste/ spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad ni sa bon med pa'i
73b5(mdo sde): phyir rtsa ba med pa/ chos thams cad ni rtsa ba rnam par byang ba'i phyir skyon med pa/ chos thams cad ni lus med pa'i phyir 'ongs pa med pa/ chos thams cad ni gnas pa med pa'i phyir song ba med
73b6(mdo sde): pa| chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir chags pa med pa/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir stong pa/ chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir nges par
73b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba/ chos thams cad ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin khong du chud pa'i phyir rang gi kha na las pa/ chos thams cad ni shes bya'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir byang chub pa/ chos thams cad ni rdzas med pa'i
74a1(mdo sde): phyir ming tsam pa/ chos thams cad ni bstan du med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir lta ba dang bral ba/ chos thams cad ni lus med pa'i phyir bcings pa med pa/ chos thams
74a2(mdo sde): cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir grol ba med pa/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir thibs po med pa/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dbyings gcig
74a3(mdo sde): pa| chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir tha mi dad do snyam du de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i
74a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can tha dad du mi byed/ chos tha dad du mi byed/ theg pa tha dad du mi byed/ sangs rgyas tha dad du mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad du mi byed/ tha ma dang /
74a5(mdo sde): mchog dang / bcings pa dang / thar pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / spong ba med/ 'dzin pa med/ 'jug pa med/ ldog pa med/
74a6(mdo sde): len pa med/ 'dor ba med de/ mi g.yo ba thob cing gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba la gnas pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa na gnas pa'i sangs
74a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzigs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /
74b1(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ sems
74b2(mdo sde): can thams cad mngon sum du byas nas bdag kyang sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub bo/ /'di ltar gang de bzhin gshegs
74b3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag bdag
74b4(mdo sde): gis bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dran pa nye bar 'jog go / dran pa des gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dran pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dri ma med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'od gsal ba/
74b5(mdo sde): bag la nyal ba med pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par chad pa/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba/ ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa/
74b6(mdo sde): chos kyi dbang du gyur pa/ lha'i dbang du gyur pa/ nges par gyur pa thams cad thob pa/ shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma med pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi rtog pa/ rang
74b7(mdo sde): bzhin gyis rnam par mi rtog pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ mthu sgrib pa med pa/ thogs pa med par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgyas par byed pa/ nam mkha' ltar 'gyur
75a1(mdo sde): ba med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de dag rjes su dran no/ /dran pa rin po che sangs rgyas rnams kyi nor/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod de dag rjes su dran te/
75a2(mdo sde): de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dran pa'ang ma yin/ mi dran pa'ang ma yin par thams cad du lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i dran pa de dag rjes su
75a3(mdo sde): dran te/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas ni sems can dang chos la tha dad pa'i 'du shes mi mnga' ba ste/ de dag gi dran pa rjes su dran pas de'i phyir sangs
75a4(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog /mi len/ mi 'dor/ mi 'khor/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'/ mi skye mi 'gag pa ste/ de dag rjes su
75a5(mdo sde): dran nas de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po mnga' ba/ byams pa chen po
75a6(mdo sde): dang | snying rje chen po'i spyod yul can/ /sems can gyi phung po chen po'i skyabs su gyur pa/ mgon du gyur pa/ sman pa chen po zug rdu 'byin pa/ sems can thams cad la sems
75a7(mdo sde): snyoms pa/ rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul ba/ 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin
75b1(mdo sde): pa| sems can chen po'i gnas/ sems can chen po'i rten/ rnam par 'dren pa/ chos kyi sku spyod yul ba/ thams cad du khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rtag tu sems can gyi
75b2(mdo sde): don la dgyes pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rgya che ba/ phyad par lung ston pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa/ bag chags dang bcas pa'i
75b3(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dkrugs pa/ bdud dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa/ rtsod pa med pa'i chos kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ rgya mtsho thams cad pas ches zab
75b4(mdo sde): pa| ri rab thams cad pas ches mtho ba/ sa bas ches brtan pa/ chu bas ches mnyen pa/ me bas ches 'bar ba/ rlung bas ches chags pa med pa/ nam mkha' bas ches dri ma med pa/ yid
75b5(mdo sde): kyi 'gro ba bas ches mgyogs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba/ chags pa thams
75b6(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa'i rgyun ma bcad pa/ gzugs tshad med pa/ sgra tshad med pa/ yon tan tshad med pa/ yul tshad med pa/ bsam gyis
75b7(mdo sde): mi khyab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rig pa dang / zhabs
76a1(mdo sde): kyi sems dang ldan pa/ lam gsum gyi sdig pa rnams yang dag par chad pa/ snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ sems can thams cad dang thun
76a2(mdo sde): mong ba'i yon tan can/ sems can thams cad kyi pha ma lta bur gyur pa/ dgra zun la sems snyoms pa/ ste'u dang / tsan+dan du mtshungs pa/ sems can tha ma dang / 'bring dang /
76a3(mdo sde): mchog thams cad la thams cad du rtag tu gsal bar byed pa'i chos can/ pha rol dpag par dka' ba sems can chen po/ longs spyod chen po/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa
76a4(mdo sde): chen po/ chos gsung ba chen po/ 'dul ba gsung ba chen po/ skyes bu chen po/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ 'jig rten
76a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi snang bar gyur pa/ rnal 'byor chen po la rnal 'byor pa/ bsam gtan chen po spyod yul pa/ rnam par grol ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa/ bdag nyid che ba/ skye
76a6(mdo sde): po chen po'i zham ring ba dang ldan pa/ skye bo khyad par can gyi zham ring ba dang ldan pa/ lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / sten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa mi ldog pa/ bdag bde ba la mi
76a7(mdo sde): lta ba| gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa la dgyes pa/ chos la gzhol ba/ chos kyi nor can/ chos kyi zas can/ chos kyi sman can/ chos kyi gter can/ chos kyi dbang
76b1(mdo sde): phyug |chos kyi bdag po/ chos kyi sbyin bdag /rtag tu gtong ba la mngon par dgyes pa/ rtag tu bag yod pa/ rtag tu dben pa la mngon par dgyes pa/ thams cad du stegs dang / zam par
76b2(mdo sde): gyur pa/ rgyal po'i lam chen po dang 'dra ba/ nyi ma chen po dang 'dra ba/ tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba dang / ye shes chen po'i rdo rje 'chang ba/ chos chen pos dbugs 'byin pa/ gzugs lta bas mi
76b3(mdo sde): ngoms pa/ mthong bas mi ngoms pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de ltar rjes su dran no/ /de ltar de dag rjes su dran pas de dag gi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sbyor ro/ /dran pa
76b4(mdo sde): nye bar 'jog go / brtson 'grus brtsam mo/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /de la
76b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yon tan
76b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas mu med pa ste/ de dag ni chos las skyes pa/ chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ chos kyis sprul pa/ chos bdag por gyur pa/ chos las byung ba/ chos kyi spyod yul/ chos la rton
76b7(mdo sde): pa| chos kyis grub pa ste/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/ chos kyis rnyed pa/ chos kyis grub pa'o/ /gang de bzhin
77a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi bo de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/ chos kyis rnyed pa/ chos kyis grub pa'o/ /gang
77a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/ chos kyis rnyed pa/ chos kyis grub pa'o/ /gang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
77a3(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i bde ba yod pa de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/ chos kyis rnyed pa/ chos kyis grub pa'o/ /de lta bas na bdag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas chos gtso bor bya'o/ /chos
77a4(mdo sde): spyod yul ba dang / chos la rton pa dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos snying por byed pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
77a5(mdo sde): chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ chos ni sems can thams cad la mnyam par 'jug pas chos
77a6(mdo sde): ni tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab mthong nas 'jug pa ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /gnas ni phyogs su ma lhung bas chos ni ngo bor lta zhing
77a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni dus chad pa med pa 'di mthong ba la don yod pa rang gis rig pas chos ni dus la lta zhing
77b1(mdo sde): 'jug pa ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni mtho dma' med pas chos ni rgya chen po la 'jug pa ma yin/ dman pa la 'jug pa ma yin te/ de
77b2(mdo sde): ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang mthun pa'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni mchog dang / tha ma dang bral bas chos ni rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa'ang ma yin/ nyams pa la 'jug pa'ang ma yin te/ de
77b3(mdo sde): ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni zhing dang / zhing ma yin pa'i lta ba dang bral bas chos ni 'phags pa la 'jug pa'ang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo la 'jug pa'ang ma
77b4(mdo sde): yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas chos ni nyin mo 'jug la/ mtshan mo mi 'jug pa ma yin/ mtshan mo 'jug
77b5(mdo sde): la nyin mo mi 'jug pa ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni gang la'ang na ma yang sdod pa ma yin pas chos ni 'dul ba'i dus las kyang mi 'da' ste/
77b6(mdo sde): de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni thams cad du 'dod pa med pas chos ni sdang ba rnams la zhe 'gras pa'ang med/ dad pa rnams la rjes su chags pa'ang med
77b7(mdo sde): de| de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni bri ba'ang ma yin/ gang ba'ang ma yin te/ dpag tu med/ grangs med pas nam mkha' ltar 'bri ba'ang ma yin /
78a1(mdo sde): 'phel ba'ang ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni sems can rnams kyis bsrung ba ma yin gyi chos kyis sems
78a2(mdo sde): can rnams bsrung ba ste/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni skyabs yongs su tshol ba ma yin pas chos ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs yin te/ de
78a3(mdo sde): ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos ni gang la'ang thogs pa med de/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i
78a4(mdo sde): sems su bya'o/ /chos ni bag la nyal med pas bag la nyal la mi 'jug ste/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni rtag tu rnam par mi rtog pas chos ni
78a5(mdo sde): 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa'ang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la rjes su chags pa'ang ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o snyam mo/ /de ltar na
78a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog pas de'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa
78a7(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ dge
78b1(mdo sde): 'dun ni chos smra ba/ chos spyod pa/ chos sems pa/ chos kyi zhing / chos 'dzin pa/ chos la rton pa/ chos la mchod pa/ chos kyi bya ba byed pa/ chos spyod yul ba/ chos spyod pa phun sum tshogs
78b2(mdo sde): pa| rang bzhin gyis drang ba/ rang bzhin gyis dang ba/ snying rje ba'i chos can/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ rtag tu dpen pa spyod yul ba/ rtag tu chos la gzhol ba/ rtag tu dkar po spyod pa'o snyam
78b3(mdo sde): mo| |gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun rnam pa du mar gsungs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun dang / don dam pa'i dge
78b4(mdo sde): 'dun dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i dge 'dun dang / ngo tsha med pa'i dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang / cang shes kyi dge 'dun dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun no snyam mo/ /de
78b5(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' ni kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/ /don dam pa'i dge 'dun la bsten pa'i phyir nan tan byed do/ /ngo tsha shes pa'i dge 'dun rnam par thar
78b6(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/ /ngo tsha med pa'i dge 'dun yongs su gdul ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed do/ /
78b7(mdo sde): cang shes kyi dge 'dun la sangs rgyas bzhin du nan tan byed do/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la chos kyi gtam gyi phyir nan tan byed do/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
79a1(mdo sde): du sems te/ rigs 'dzin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir zhing bzang po rnams kyi dge
79a2(mdo sde): 'dun no/ /gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /yongs su 'dzin pa gtong zhing 'dor ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba rnams kyi dge 'dun
79a3(mdo sde): no| |shin tu dul ba'i phyir cang shes pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /ma 'dres pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /sdig pa dang bral ba'i phyir ngo tsha shes pa rnams kyi dge
79a4(mdo sde): 'dun no/ /bka' blo bde ba'i phyir slob ma rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /bdag yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bdag gis med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /zhi ba'i phyir rgyags
79a5(mdo sde): pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /'dod pa nyung ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /rnam par rtog pa yang dag par chad pa'i phyir nad med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun
79a6(mdo sde): no| |pha rol tu son pa'i phyir thang la gnas pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /thang la gnas pa'i phyir bde ba thob pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /de kho na mthong ba'i phyir bag yod pa rnams
79a7(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun no/ /skyon ma chags pa'i phyir dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub la gzhol ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /bslab pa gsum gyis bya ba shes
79b1(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa spyod yul ba'i phyir dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /yang dag par spong ba spyod yul ba'i phyir
79b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa spyod yul ba'i phyir ngal ba med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /dbang po spyod yul ba'i phyir mi phyed pa rnams kyi dge 'dun
79b3(mdo sde): no| |stobs spyod yul ba'i phyir tsher ma dkrugs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag spyod yul ba'i phyir bsgrib pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /lam spyod yul ba'i
79b4(mdo sde): phyir yang dag par lta ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /bden pa spyod yul ba'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /bsam gtan spyod yul ba'i phyir mnyam par bzhag pa rnams kyi
79b5(mdo sde): dge 'dun no/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba spyod yul ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi dge
79b6(mdo sde): 'dun no/ /bsod nams thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no snyam mo/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge 'dun rjes
79b7(mdo sde): su dran pas 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dge 'dun gyi yang dag pa'i yon tan de dag ni bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems
80a1(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe
80a2(mdo sde): na| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni tshul khrims
80a3(mdo sde): las byung bar blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims ni phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa ni sman dang / rtswa dang / nags tshal
80a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi gnas yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyang phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi gnas la rab tu gnas
80a5(mdo sde): pa ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin no/ /sbyin pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs par yang byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
80a6(mdo sde): dga' ba skye'o/ /yid dga' bas 'gyod pa med do/ /'gyod pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba 'thob bo/ /mchog tu dga' bas lus dang / sems shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro/ /lus
80a7(mdo sde): dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pas bde ste ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /yid mnyam par bzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba yin no/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i
80b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dang / chos
80b2(mdo sde): rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo/ /de snying rje chen po des bskul bas lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab la bslab
80b3(mdo sde): pa yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bas na bdag gis kyang tshul khrims la gnas pa mi bskyod pa mi lhod par
80b4(mdo sde): bya'o| |sems can thams cad mngon du byas nas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa
80b5(mdo sde): dang / bde ba'i gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin no/ /gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni gnod sems
80b6(mdo sde): med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba'i tshul khrims ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bslab
80b7(mdo sde): pa dang sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i nges par sems pa'i
81a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims ni mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi phyogs
81a2(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems
81a3(mdo sde): dpa'i thos pa yongs su tshol ba'i tshul khrims ni nga rgyal med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims
81a4(mdo sde): ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad chud mi za ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su
81a5(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'i tshul khrims ni chos smra ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar
81a6(mdo sde): thos pa'i chos rnams sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni gzungs dang / spobs pa thob pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi tshul khrims ni skye
81a7(mdo sde): ba thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi sems
81b1(mdo sde): chud mi za bar yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems chud mi za ba'i tshul khrims ni dkon mchog gsum chud mi za ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do snyam
81b2(mdo sde): mo| |de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ tshul khrims bsrungs pas bsrung ba thams cad bsrungs pa yin no snyam pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i
81b3(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang
81b4(mdo sde): ci gtong ba de thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing gi gtong ba dang / chos kyi gtong ba dang / gtong ba rnam pa gnyis kyi nang du 'dus so snyam mo/ /de la zang zing gi gtong bas ni byang
81b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po yongs su skor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa rnam par dag pa yongs su
81b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed do/ /chos kyi gtong bas ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bag chags kyang
81b7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'joms par byed do/ /gzhan yang / zang zing gi gtong bas ni phung po thams cad nges par 'dor bar byed do/ /chos kyi gtong bas ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
82a1(mdo sde): cad kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'o/ /gzhan yang / zang zing gi gtong bas ni skye ba'i lus yongs su sbyong bar byed do/ /chos kyi gtong bas ni chos kyi sku yongs su
82a2(mdo sde): sbyong bar byed do/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi gtong bas ni pha ma las byung ba'i stobs sgrub par byed de/ stobs de ni de bzhin
82a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par su la'ang med do/ /chos kyi gtong bas ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs sgrub par byed de/ stobs de ni
82a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par su la'ang med do/ /gzhan yang / zang zing gi gtong bas ni yongs su smin par byed do//
82a5(mdo sde): chos kyi gtong bas ni rnam par thar bar byed do/ /gzhan yang / zang zing gi gtong bas ni tshogs gsag go /chos kyi gtong bas ni sgrol lo/ /gzhan yang / zang zing gi gtong bas ni nor
82a6(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ngo / /chos kyi gtong bas ni thams cad gtong ngo / /gzhan yang / zang zing gi gtong bas ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed do/ /chos kyi gtong
82a7(mdo sde): bas ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed do/ /gzhan yang / gtong ba gtong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs su rtog pa gtong ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /'di lta ste/ yongs
82b1(mdo sde): su rtog pa gtong ba de ni gtong ba rnams kyi dam pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su rtog pa btang bas byang chub sems dpa' dag pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yongs su rtog
82b2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dwags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las sgro btags pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /smras pa/ ji
82b3(mdo sde): ltar na yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las sgro btags pa yin/ smras pa/ nam 'di ltar bdag ni chags pa/ bdag ni zhe sdang ba/ bdag ni gti mug pa/ bdag ni nyon mongs pa/
82b4(mdo sde): bdag ni rnam par dag pa/ bdag ni bcings pa/ bdag ni grol ba/ bdag ni 'khor ba/ bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o snyam pa la sogs par sgro btags pa thams cad ni
82b5(mdo sde): yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las yongs su brtags pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di dag thams cad ni rgyu dang / rkyen tsam ste/ 'di la bdag dang / bdag gi med/ sems can med/
82b6(mdo sde): srog med/ gang zag med/ shes las skyes med/ shed bu med do/ /rgyu dang / rkyen de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa/ rang bzhin gyis dben pa/ sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam
82b7(mdo sde): par shes pa dang bral ba/ mi sems pa/ yongs su mi rtog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa/ rnam par byang ba ma yin pa/ 'khor ba ma yin pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
83a1(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin pa la sgro mi 'dogs shing / de sgro 'dogs pa btang bas gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o/ /
83a2(mdo sde): nam chos de dag rjes su dran pa de ni de'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba rnam pa gsum ste/ gtong ba dang / gtong
83a3(mdo sde): ba chen po dang / shin tu gtong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba sbyin pa dang / btung ba dang / bzhon
83a4(mdo sde): pa dang / gos dang / mar me dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / shing rta
83a5(mdo sde): dang | rgyan la sogs pa sbyin pa ste/ sbyin pa gang sems can rnams la gnod pa dang / phongs par 'gyur ba de ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' dag sems can rnams la
83a6(mdo sde): mi sbyin pa gang yang med de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba chen po gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
83a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' gtong ba phun sum tshogs nas gtong ba chen po byed de/ 'di lta ste/ chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed
83b1(mdo sde): pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / khyim dang / rgyal srid rnams yongs su gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu
83b2(mdo sde): gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po phun sum tshogs nas shin tu gtong ba byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna
83b3(mdo sde): dang | sha dang / rus pa dang / pags pa dang / mig dang / lce dang / mgo dang / rus dang / rkang la sogs pa yongs su gtong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu gtong ba zhes
83b4(mdo sde): bya'o| |de la byang chub sems dpa' des gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po dang / shin tu gtong ba de dag rjes su dran nas/ bdag gis kyang dran pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o
83b5(mdo sde): snyam pa de ni de'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes
83b6(mdo sde): su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ /'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gang rnam par dag pa'i lha/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang
83b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag rjes su dran no/ /'di ltar de dag rjes su dran te/ bsgrub pa dang / yon tan dang / skye ba dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang / rtsom pa dang /
84a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su 'grub pas kyang rjes su dran pa 'di ni lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /gang lha gzhan de dag
84a2(mdo sde): kyang rjes su dran no/ /'di ltar de dag rjes su dran te/ lha 'di dag ni las dge ba'i 'bras bu las byung ba'o/ /dge ba'i las de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi
84a3(mdo sde): dge ba las bzlog pa rnams so/ /de la lha gang rnams kha dog dang ldan pa/ bde ba mang ba/ dbang po tshim pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi rnam par smin pa'o//
84a4(mdo sde): snyam ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i bde ba de la rjes su yi rang nas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
84a5(mdo sde): bsngo'o/ /lha'i bde ba de'ang sems can thams cad kyir 'dod do/ /bde ba de sems can thams cad kyir 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chen
84a6(mdo sde): po rtsom mo/ /ngan song rnams su skyes pa'i sems can dag la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i
84a7(mdo sde): las byed du gzud do/ /sems can gang dag lhar gyur pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /gang gis sems can
84b1(mdo sde): rnams lha'i bde ba thob nas phyis nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gyur nas/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'i las de dag sems
84b2(mdo sde): can rnams byed du gzhug go snyam du sems pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
84b3(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bcu'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis de'i tshe don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa dag gis smras pa/ gang phyir sdug bsngal ma gtogs
84b4(mdo sde): par| |stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pas/ /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal mi lta ste/ /sdug bsngal stong par blta bar bya/ /stong pa nyid ni lta 'dod pas/ /sdug bsngal yang dag blta bar bya/ /sdug
84b5(mdo sde): bsngal stong pa nyid kyi don/ /stong pa de ni 'dus ma byas/ /sdug bsngal byas pa ma yin pas/ /sdug bsngal la ni byed pa med/ /sdug bsngal bral ba'i byed pa po/ /ma byung 'byung bar
84b6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te sdug bsngal yang dag tu/ /kun nas sgrib pa med gyur te/ /gal te sdug bsngal byas min na/ /'di la kun 'byung ga la yod/ /sdug bsngal la ni 'ong med do/ /
84b7(mdo sde): gang du yang mi 'gro min na/ /gang gis de yi chags 'byung ba/ /sdug bsngal med na ga la yod/ /gal te sdug bsngal kun 'byung ste/ /sred pa kun 'byung bshad na ni/ /sred
85a1(mdo sde): can sred yod ma yin na/ /med na kun 'byung ji ltar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal la ni 'ong med de/ /'ong ba med na ci zhig 'gro /'ong dpa' gro ba med par ni/ /'gog
85a2(mdo sde): pa zhi ba zhes bstan to/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis zhi/ /rtsa ba dag cing 'od kyang gsal/ /'gog pa dang ni chos rnams mtshungs/ /thams cad mtha' gnyis rab tu spangs/ /sngon
85a3(mdo sde): du skyes pa'i chos rnams kyang / /de ma thag tu 'gag par 'gyur/ /dgag pa med par skye ba med/ /skye ba med par zad pa med/ /de ltar gang gi blo tshol ba/ /de ni chags med zad
85a4(mdo sde): med lam/ /lam ni gzings dang 'dra bar bstan/ /mdor na gzings ni spang bar bya/ /gang bsags spang bar bya ba yi/ /chos de la ni ci zhig dga'/ /lam spangs thang la gnas
85a5(mdo sde): pa de| |rnal 'byor pa ni grol zhes brjod/ /des ni lam gyi ye shes kyis/ /gang phyir chos kun bsgoms pas na/ /grol ba'i mtshan nyid rab bstan pa/ /de ni gang du'ang
85a6(mdo sde): rtsod pa med/ /skra dang ba spu sen mo so/ /sha dang rus pa khrag dang zhag /tshil dang shas rgyas phyis dang / /mkhris pa bad kan klad pa dang / /mcher pa rgyus pa gnye ma dang / /
85a7(mdo sde): gcin gyi phung po lus zhes brjod/ /rnal 'byor pas ni lus rnams la/ /yod min kun brtags tsam du mthong / /'di la byed dang tshor ba dang / /mthong ba po ni gang yang med/ /
85b1(mdo sde): lus zhes bya bar rang bzhin gyis/ /grong stong dang ni 'dra ba'o/ /tshor ba myong bar rab bstan pa/ /tshor ba po las tshor ba gzhan/ /gud na yod pa ma yin na/ /gang gis de ni myong bar 'gyur//
85b2(mdo sde): byang chub ci 'dra de bzhin du/ /zhi zhing dag la 'od gsal bar/ /tshor ba 'di la mkhas rnams kyis/ /dran pa de la nye bar bzhag /lus la sems ni mi mthong ste/ /sems la yang ni
85b3(mdo sde): sems de bzhin/ /de ltar shes nas 'khrug pa med/ /grol ba po ni dga' ba'ang med/ /sems tsam du ni rab mthong ste/ /kun tu rtog pa kun spangs kyang / /sgrib pa med pa'i spyod
85b4(mdo sde): yul can/ /rnal 'byor gtong ba'ang ma yin no/ /chos rnams rang 'byung ma yin te/ /gang gis kyang ni bsgrubs pa med/ /grangs med cing ni yi ge med/ /de ni nam mkha' 'dra
85b5(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan/ /chos 'di rtogs par khong chud nas/ /chos shes pa yi rnal 'byor can/ /mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas pa/ /'jug pa med cing ldog pa'ang med/ /gang gis chos
85b6(mdo sde): dran 'di 'dra ste/ /thams cad chos las mi g.yo ba/ /de dag pha rol phyin pa brtan/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyin pa sbyong / /sangs rgyas don rnams kun la mkhas/ /sgrib pa kun gyi
85b7(mdo sde): dri ma med/ /dkar po thams cad yang dag spyod/ /sems can kun la phan par bzhed/ /rigs dang gzugs dang yon tan las/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pa gang / /yang
86a1(mdo sde): dag dran pa de dag ni/ /dkar po'i chos kyis rab tu rgyas/ /gang zhig rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing / /chos la dran pa mi g.yeng ba/ /des ni 'das dang ma 'ongs
86a2(mdo sde): pa'i| |sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byas/ /dam pa'i chos la brten chos can/ /chos rjes dran pa spyod yul ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs brtan/ /rdzogs pa'i
86a3(mdo sde): byang chub rtogs par 'gyur/ /chos rnams ci 'dra de bzhin du/ /bdag 'gyur snyam du gang dran pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag des/ /chos dran pa 'di shes par bya/ /
86a4(mdo sde): nga yir med cing ngar 'dzin med/ /chos rnams ci 'dra de ltar bdag /'gyur ro snyam du dran pa ni/ /chos rjes dran pa 'di bsgom yin/ /bla na med pa bsod nams zhing / /dge
86a5(mdo sde): 'dun sangs rgyas slob ma rnams/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'gyur ba dag /rtag tu yang dag rjes su dran/ /rgya mtsho lta bur dpag dka' rnams/ /bdag gis rjes su dran pa yi/ /
86a6(mdo sde): bsod nams rab tu gang bsags des/ /sems can de bzhin gshegs gyur cig /mi ldog ngang tshul can rnams kyi/ /tshul khrims yang dag rjes dran pa/ /sems can kun
86a7(mdo sde): la phan sems pa/ /mchog gis bsod nams gang bskyed pa/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsngo/ /sems can kun la phan byed pa/ /
86b1(mdo sde): de ni tshul khrims dran zhes bya/ /zang zing med pas chos btang dang / /nyon mongs spangs pa'i gang dge ba/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid bsngo bar byed/ /
86b2(mdo sde): gtong ba rjes dran phun sum tshogs/ /zhing dang skye la rab gnas pa/ /mtshan ma med cing rtsol med pa/ /nyi ma bzhin du kun tu shar/ /lha rnams kun gyi dge ba gang / /dge ba'i
86b3(mdo sde): las las rab byung ba/ /bde de sems can thams cad phyir/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid de ltar 'dod/ /gang gis 'jig rten lhar gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas bla na med gyur pa/ /bde ba de dag
86b4(mdo sde): rtag tu bya/ /bdag gis de lta de ltar bsgrub// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med dang / byang chub sems dpa'
86b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon dang gnyis ka g.yog dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
86b6(mdo sde): phyag btsal nas/ lan du ma bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ g.yog dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ skyes bu dam pa de
86b7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gnyis 'dir gcig tu 'dus nas chos yang dag par brjod pa bgyis na/ sangs rgyas
87a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi rig pa'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
87a2(mdo sde): cag gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa dang mthun pa bgyis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de
87a3(mdo sde): lta'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi rig pa'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad tsam yang mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
87a4(mdo sde): thams cad du sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa dang mthun par byas so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /byang chub sems dpa'
87a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi gang ci smra ba dang / kun smra ba de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rigs par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /ji ltar khyod
87a6(mdo sde): gnyis kyis byas pa de bzhin du chos yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyed gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so/ /de
87a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'ang khyed gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa la rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med la 'di skad
87b1(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci'i phyir rtsom pa med ces bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / ngag
87b2(mdo sde): dang | yid kyi las kyi mtha' ni shin tu byang ba/ bya ba thams cad la mi chags pa/ gang yang mi tshol ba/ cung zad kyang spang bar mi 'dod pa/ thob par mi 'dod pa/ 'das pa dang /
87b3(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de bzhin nyid du mnyam par mthong ba/ tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi chos cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni rtsom pa med ces bya'o//
87b4(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas med par gyur na/ rtsom pa med pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te chos 'ga' zhig gzod ma nas yod par gyur na ni de
87b5(mdo sde): brtsam par bya na chos gang yang gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin te/ gzod ma nas med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni brtsams pa med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ de
87b6(mdo sde): lta yin na khyod kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa de ji ltar byas/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtsams pa med pa nyid bdag gis
87b7(mdo sde): chos yang dag par rjed pa byas pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang khyod kyis dri ba dris pa 'di ci khyod kyis 'di brtsams te dris sam/ 'on te ma brtsams
88a1(mdo sde): par dris/ de gal te khyod kyis brtsams te dris na ni ci la rten te brtsams/ gang rtsom pa dang bcas pa de ni 'dri ba ma yin no/ /rtsom pa'ang gzhan la 'dri
88a2(mdo sde): pa'ang gzhan zhes ni byar mi 'thad do/ /ci stem brtsams par dris na ni khyod gtam 'di la zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang bdag
88a3(mdo sde): dang khyod kyi brjod pa de ji ltar blta bar bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa'i brjod pa ji lta
88a4(mdo sde): bar de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i brjod pa'ang de ltar blta bar bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgyu ma sprul pa la ni sems dang /
88a5(mdo sde): sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med do/ /gang la sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med pa de ci zhig rtsom par 'gyur/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi
88a6(mdo sde): 'phen pa'i dbang gis sgyu ma sprul pa'i brjod pa 'byung ba ji lta bar de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i brjod pa'ang de ltar blta
88a7(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sgyu ma sprul pa ni 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ ma byung ba'ang ma yin na/ ci khyod kyang byung ba'ang ma yin/
88b1(mdo sde): ma byung ba'ang ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs
88b2(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas rab tu ma bshad dam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs
88b3(mdo sde): rgyas nas rab tu bshad de/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar sgyu ma byung ba'ang ma yin/ ma byung ba'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du sgyu ma
88b4(mdo sde): lta bu'i chos de dag thams cad kyang byung ba'ang ma yin/ ma byung ba'ang ma yin par blta bar mi bya'am/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te byung ba'am/ ma byung ba zhig yod na
88b5(mdo sde): ni sgyu ma lta bur yang bstan par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod su'i ched du spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun
88b6(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni don nam/ don ma yin pa'i ched la'ang mi skyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang don gyi ched la spyod pa de ni dmigs pa la spyod pa'o/ /dmigs pa la spyod pa de
88b7(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa de ni rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang mi 'thob ste/ bzod pa med na sangs rgyas
89a1(mdo sde): mnyes par byed pa ma yin no/ /'on te don ma yin pa'i ched la spyod na ni log par lta ba la spyod pa'o/ /log par lta ba ni don med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
89a2(mdo sde): ri'i dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang dag don dang / don ma yin pa'i ched la mi spyod pa de dag gang du spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ byis
89a3(mdo sde): pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la de dag spyod do/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa /
89a4(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang spyod mod kyi/ de
89a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams pa gang la spyod pa de nyid la bdag cag kyang spyod do snyam du mi sems so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras
89a6(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs med pa ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
89a7(mdo sde): rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang spyod de/ 'di ni 'gal lo/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sangs
89b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul shes sam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ sbrang bu 'dra ba bdag lta bus sangs rgyas kyi yul shes par ga la zhus mod kyi/ 'on kyang rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa las thos
89b2(mdo sde): nas ni nyan thos rnams kyis kyang shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mtha' yas mu med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul las rnam par grol ba'i yul ni gang yang med do/ /byang chub
89b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul las rnam par grol ba'i yul med na ci'i phyir khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul la byis pa so so'i
89b4(mdo sde): skye bo rnams kyi go skabs med ces smras/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yul la las yang dag par 'das pa'o/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo
89b5(mdo sde): rnams ni 'jig rten nyid ni spyod pa'o/ /de bas na sangs rgyas kyi yul la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun
89b6(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ gang du bzhugs nas su'i don mdzad/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu /
89b7(mdo sde): gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i chos gang yang med de/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi don
90a1(mdo sde): mdzad cing 'dus byas nyid la spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar shes na ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
90a2(mdo sde): rten gyi yul las yang dag par 'das zhes smras/ de ni gnas brtan shA ri'i bus khong du ma chud do/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi yul
90a3(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das su zin na de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / gang du bzhugs nas su'i don mdzad par 'gyur te/ 'di la gnas
90a4(mdo sde): brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa ni shin tu nyams so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces
90a5(mdo sde): smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las shin tu nyams shing / nyan thos kyis la'ang shin tu gnas pas bdag
90a6(mdo sde): ni sngon nas kyang nyams so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag ni khyod kyi spobs pa 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo / /sems can thams cad kyang khyod kyi spobs pa 'di lta bu thob par gyur
90a7(mdo sde): cig / gtam brjod pa 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu drug stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi
90b1(mdo sde): mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go / dge slong lnga stong ni nyan thos kyi sems las log nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
90b2(mdo sde): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes lung bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
90b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa
90b4(mdo sde): la mkhas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thams cad yang dag par shes pa de'i tshe gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa
90b5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thams cad ji ltar shes par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
90b6(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam dang / sgyu ma dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / smig rgyu dang / mgal me bskor ba dang / skra shad 'dzings pa dang / sprul pa dang / brag ca dang /
90b7(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan lta bur thams cad blta bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang rmi lam dang / sgyu ma dang / dri za'i grong
91a1(mdo sde): khyer dang / smig rgyu dang / mgal me bskor ba dang / skra shad 'dzings pa dang / sprul pa dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur blta ba
91a2(mdo sde): thams cad gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ thams cad ces bya ba ni mig dang / gzugs dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang /
91a3(mdo sde): ro dang | lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / chos rnams te/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag ni gang rmi lam dang / sgyu ma dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / smig rgyu dang / mgal me bskor ba
91a4(mdo sde): dang | skra shad 'dzings pa lta bu dang / sprul pa dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur blta bar bya ba'i shes pa thams cad do/ /de la 'dzin pa ni mig dang / rna ba dang /
91a5(mdo sde): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnams so/ /gzung ba ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams te/ gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i chos
91a6(mdo sde): 'di dag rnam pa dang / tshul thams cad kyis shes pa dang / khong du chud pa dang / ston nus pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa de
91a7(mdo sde): ni bag la nyal ba med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ ngar 'dzin pa med pa/ nga yir 'dzin pa med pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ mi 'gyur ba/ sems can thams cad la
91b1(mdo sde): sems mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad du dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad du lhun gyis grub pa/ lhun gyis grub
91b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos can/ sems can gyi snying po/ sems can thams cad kyi dam pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i chos can/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ mi bskyod pa'i chos can/ yang dag par
91b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
91b4(mdo sde): kyi chos nyid 'di khong du chud par 'tshal bas ji lta bur bgyi / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan
91b5(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi chos nyid 'di khong du chud par 'dod pas sems can thams cad kyi ngan du byas pa dang / mi snyan pa thams cad bzod par bya ba'i phyir sems dang mtshungs
91b6(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /bdag dang / sems can gzhan rnams kyi rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad bkur ba'i phyir sems chu dang mtshungs par bya'o/ /shes
91b7(mdo sde): rab kyis bdag dang / sems can gzhan rnams kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa'i rtsi shing bsreg pa'i phyir sems me dang mtshungs par bya'o/ /chags pa thams cad dang dbral ba'i
92a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sems rlung dang mtshungs par bya'o/ /thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bya'o/ /thams
92a2(mdo sde): cad du 'jigs pa med cing skrag pa med pas byang chub sems dpas seng ge dang mtshungs par bya'o/ /shin tu dul ba'i sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba'i phyir byang
92a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpas glang po che dang mtshungs par bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas sprin lta bur bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la ye
92a4(mdo sde): shes kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas nyi ma lta bur bya'o/ /thams cad du sems can thams cad la rtag tu bde bar snang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas
92a5(mdo sde): zla ba lta bur bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rin po che'i gling chen por phyogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ded dpon lta bur bya'o/ /sems can thams
92a6(mdo sde): cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gso ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas sman pa lta bur bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi chos la the tshom za ba'i zug rdu 'don pa'i
92a7(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpas zug rdu 'byin pa lta bur bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyogs la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas gdos pa 'dzin pa lta bur
92b1(mdo sde): bya'o| |'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sems can sgrol ba la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas gru lta bur bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa'i phyir byang chub sems
