149b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' yid kyis smon pa thams cad bral zhing chos gang
149b6(mdo sde): yang gzung par ram/ spang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ da gang dang / gang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de dang / de stong pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par mthong ba ste/ lha'i
149b7(mdo sde): bu| de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
150a1(mdo sde): du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpas gang bdag dang / sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du
150a2(mdo sde): mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong pa'o/ /lha'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
150a3(mdo sde): 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dul ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang rnam par rtog par rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o/ lha'i bu bzang
150a4(mdo sde): sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na zhi ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba
150a5(mdo sde): de zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang
150a6(mdo sde): chub ni rang gi kha na las pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni ji lta ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su spong ba de lta de lta sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su
150a7(mdo sde): 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang nas kyang blang ba ma lags/ gang du'ang bkur ba ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad la ye
150b1(mdo sde): shes rnam par dag pa ni byang chub ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bzod pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa lags so/ /gang 'di ltar shes pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags
150b2(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de dang / de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la
150b3(mdo sde): bsten pa de dang / de dag ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di nyid la bzod pa de dang / de dag ni bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang
150b4(mdo sde): dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la thos pa dang / sems pa dang / bsgom pa la brtson pa de dang / de dag ni brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid
150b5(mdo sde): 'di la nges par rtog pa de dang / de dag ni bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa lags so/ /gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di rnam par dpyod pa de dang / de dag ni shes rab dang ldan pa lags
150b6(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gang dad pa rnyed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /de dag gis chos mngon sum du bgyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
150b7(mdo sde): de dag gis 'dud btul to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba lags so/ /bcom
151a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khong du chud par de dag chos rtogs pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bzang
151a2(mdo sde): sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzang sems/ legs so/ legs so/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ bzang sems/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa
151a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rab tu bstan to/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs
151a4(mdo sde): pa de thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni rnyed pa chen po 'byor bar
151a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu song ba de dag ni chos kyi gter chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su 'dzin pa de dang
151a6(mdo sde): de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid brtan pa'o/ /de dang / de dag ni gsang ba 'dzin pa'o/ /de dang / de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod par
151a7(mdo sde): byed pa'o/ /de dag ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing thos nas kyang mos pa de dang / de dag ni/ lha'i bu/ nga la lan du phan 'dogs
151b1(mdo sde): pa'o| |lha'i bu/ de dag ni phyogs thams cad du mun pa med par byed par 'gyur pa'o/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ khyed las su dag phyi
151b2(mdo sde): ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par su spro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
151b3(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni slad ba'i dus na
151b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad par spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rtsom pa mang pos ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo mi thogs so/ /bdag ni sems 'dzin
151b5(mdo sde): ba ma mchis/ rtsom pha ma mchis shing sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ste/ zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams
151b6(mdo sde): cad la re ba ma mchis pas chos zab mo la bzod pa 'di yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la gnas pas ni dam
151b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
152a1(mdo sde): nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das
152a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyi byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs
152a3(mdo sde): kyi bu/ legs so/ les so/ /sems de 'dra bas dam pa'i chos yongs so gzung bar nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom
152a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba des dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rdo thogs so/ /bdag ni snying rje chen po la dmigs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
152a5(mdo sde): par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byams pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rngo thogs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
152a6(mdo sde): na| gnod sems mang po la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni byams pa'i sems kyi sa rnam grangs 'di bshad par
152a7(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dgas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyis mthong na ngoms par mi 'gyur ba
152b1(mdo sde): des dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can thams cad la khong khro ba ma mchis pa'i sems kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung
152b2(mdo sde): par 'gyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyi don du sdug bsngal thams cad la spro ba dang /
152b3(mdo sde): gang sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal zhing sems can thams cad bsgral nas slad kyis bdag brgal bar 'tshal ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
152b4(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can
152b5(mdo sde): thams cad bsgral slad kyis bdag rgal bar 'tshal lo/ /bsgral bar bgyi ba dang / sgrol ba po dang / bsgral ba'ang ma dmigs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de lta bu'i
152b6(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzungs bar bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di ltar bdag gis dam pa'i chos
152b7(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ngo snyam pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi phyin log go/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas ni re zhig bdag nyid dul bar bgyi/ bdag nyid zhi bar bgyi'o/ /
153a1(mdo sde): bdag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar rngo thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bdag
153a2(mdo sde): nyid dul zhing zhi ba la nye bar zhi nas chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos
153a3(mdo sde): yongs su zin pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dang / 'di ltar khyed cag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung
153a4(mdo sde): bar spro ba ni legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ni khyod dang 'tsham mo/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos so/ /byang chub
153a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rtag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /chos yang dag par brjod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung
153a6(mdo sde): ba dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku'o/ /chos kyi sku ni
153a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku'o zhes sangs rgyas la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad ni ma byas pa 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes chos la snang ba chen po thob 'gyur ro/ /nga yi
153b1(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma'i dge 'dun no zhes dge 'dun la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po ni byang chub
153b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i bslab pa'i rtsa ba'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes spobs
153b3(mdo sde): pa'i snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas dang / brgya byin gyi gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas
153b4(mdo sde): su spyod par 'gyur/ de'i 'og tu dzam+bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur te/ sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su gzung bar
153b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ drang ba/ g.yo med pa/ des pa/ chos zab mo la mos pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
153b6(mdo sde): dpa' rtsom pa med dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
153b7(mdo sde): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa stong phrag brgya
154a1(mdo sde): ba'i mdo las/ rtsom pa med kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI gar+b+ha dang / bi dza ya shI la dang / shI len+d+ra
154a2(mdo sde): pho d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ da sha tsakra k+Shi ti
154a3(mdo sde): gaR+b+ha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'dus pa chen po las sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
154a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri kha la de ya zhes bya ba drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod
154a5(mdo sde): yul gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po sha stag go /
154a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sha stag
154a7(mdo sde): ste| zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo/ /me tog gi sprin
154b1(mdo sde): chen po 'dus pa las me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bab po/ /rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab
154b2(mdo sde): po| |lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bab po/ /de lta bu'i sprin dang / char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas
154b3(mdo sde): kyi ri de la khyab par gyur to/ /bsung dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / gos de dag las chos chen po'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa
154b4(mdo sde): ni| 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang / bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngang des shing bzod pa can gyi sgra dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i sgra dang /
154b5(mdo sde): bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang / shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang / grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
154b6(mdo sde): dang | gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang / gzugs
154b7(mdo sde): mi chu'i lbu ba lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o zhes
155a1(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / mi rtag pa'i sgra dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang /
155a2(mdo sde): stong pa'i sgra dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang / kun spong ba'i sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
155a3(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang / chos kun chub pa'i sgra dang / mtho ris su skye ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang / theg pa gsum la 'bab pa'i sgra dang / chos chen po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgra
155a4(mdo sde): dang | chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
155a5(mdo sde): drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / thabs mkhas pa'i sgra dang / sa bcu 'bab pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rol ba'i sgra dang / bla na med
155a6(mdo sde): pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang / sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang / spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas
155a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang / char rnam pa
155b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs mthong zhing de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro'ang thos par gyur nas de dag gi so so'i yid ci la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang / me tog dang /
155b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su brgyan par mthong ngo / /yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing yid bzhin gyi nor
155b3(mdo sde): bu rin po che de dag re re las kyang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo / /gzhan yang / nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs su byung ste/ 'od
155b4(mdo sde): zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can de dag so so nas phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo / /yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
155b5(mdo sde): de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de re re la'ang 'khor mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yongs su bskor bar mthong ngo / /gzhan yang / 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas
155b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to/ /gang bsad pa la thug pa dang /
155b7(mdo sde): btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de dag las yongs su thar bar gyur to/ /gang lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi bde bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan
156a1(mdo sde): len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to/ /gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang 'grangs shing ngoms
156a2(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /gang gsad pa dang / chad pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to/ /
156a3(mdo sde): gang bgo ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / dbyig dang / nor rdzas kyis brel cing phongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to/ /sems can gang srog
156a4(mdo sde): g cod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos
156a5(mdo sde): pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to/ /sems can gang 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa
156a6(mdo sde): dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba bzhin du rnyed par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang
156a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag thams cad zhi nas rab tu bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo / /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas
156b1(mdo sde): sprin dang / rdul dang / na bun dang / rlung dang / rdzi char dang / bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro ngan pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i
156b2(mdo sde): reg bya dang / 'jigs skrag pa dang / gnod pa mang po rnams med par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / las ngan pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i bsam pa dang / log par phyogs
156b3(mdo sde): pa dang yongs su bral te lhag par mi grang ba dang / lhag par mi tsha ba dang / rab tu zhi zhing bde ba dang / sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad dam pa thams
156b4(mdo sde): cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing mi theg pa tsam du gyur to/ /ltas 'di lta bu gyur pa
156b5(mdo sde): mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs te de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i dbang
156b6(mdo sde): bo dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ bcom
156b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa/ /bden la rab gnas thub pa
157a1(mdo sde): khyod| |'dus pa'i 'khor mang thams cad la/ /mthar phyin bden pa'i chos gsungs shig /so so'i skye bo mang po dag /sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug
157a2(mdo sde): bsngal sel/ /ci yi slad du 'khor 'dir ni/ /sprin dang char rnams gda' bar gyur/ /'khor rnams rab tu dga' rangs nas/ /shin tu dad pa'i bsam pa skyes/ /theg pa
157a3(mdo sde): chen por thams cad gzhol/ /yang dag lta skye som nyi brgal/ /'khor mang lha dang mi yi lus/ /lhag par sa yi khams lci bas/ /rang gis mi theg gyur ba 'di/ /ci yi rkyen
157a4(mdo sde): gyis ltas 'di byung / /lag mthil gnyis na nor bu'i las/ /rin chen char 'bab 'od kyang 'gyed/ /phyogs bcur snang byas sdig pa bsal/ /sdug bsngal zhi nas bde ba
157a5(mdo sde): thob| |'dren pas gsungs shig ci yi rkyen/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /spos dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyis/ /so so'i lus la brgyan pa gda'/ /lha dang mi kun the tshom skyes//
157a6(mdo sde): ci yi rgyu dang ci yi rkyen/ /su zhig gang nas 'dir mchi na/ /rdzu 'phrul mthu 'di ston par gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /'on te tshangs pa'am bdud lags
157a7(mdo sde): sam| |brgya byin lags sam su mchi ba/ /'dren pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa la 'di skad ces
157b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par byos shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs
157b2(mdo sde): med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de/ da ltar 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
157b3(mdo sde): khrig stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nga la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / gzhan yang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la
157b4(mdo sde): blta ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis 'dir 'ong bas mngon par shes pa'i mthus cho 'phrul 'di dag bstan to/ /byang chub
157b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba de tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyis yongs su brgyan pas nyan thos dang / rang
157b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dpog nus pa med de/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni yon tan phul du gyur pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa'o/ /rnam
157b7(mdo sde): par grol ba'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i ded dpon du gyur pa'o//
158a1(mdo sde): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar rin po che thams cad char bzhin du 'bab pas ji ltar re zhing 'dod pa thams cad yongs su tshim par
158a2(mdo sde): byed pa'o/ /tshong ba mang po'i rin po che'i gling lta bu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing skye ba'i phyir zhing gshin pa lta bu'o// rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la 'jog pa'i phyir snod
158a3(mdo sde): lta bu'o/ /rin po che dam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'o// dge ba'i nan tan can la snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gsal ba lta bu'o//
158a4(mdo sde): lam stor ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'i phyir sgron ma lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir zla ba ltar sim pa lta bu'o/ /rkang med pa la theg par gyur pa lta bu'o//
158a5(mdo sde): la ma ring por 'gro ba la tshogs kyi stegs bu lta bu'o/ /'brog bslad pa la lam ston pa lta bu'o/ /smyos shing 'khrugs pa la sman dam pa lta bu'o/ /nad kyis gzir ba la
158a6(mdo sde): sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad pa lta bu'o/ /rgas shing 'khogs pa la brten dang / 'khar ba lta bu'o/ /ngal ba dang / dub pa la khyi dang / stan lta bu'o/ /chu bo bzhi rgal ba la zam pa lta
158a7(mdo sde): bu'o| |pha rol tu 'gro ba la gru dang / gzings lta bu'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu khyad par can smin par byed pa'o/ /dge ba rnam gsum gyi gzhi 'dren cing rgyun
158b1(mdo sde): du 'bebs pa'o/ /sbyin pa gtong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa 'khor lo ltar 'jug pa'o/ /tshul khrims srung ba brtan pas ri rab lhun po lta bu'o/ /brtson 'grus gzhig par dka' ba na rdo rje/
158b2(mdo sde): rin po che lta bu'o/ /bzod pa mi g.yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o/ /bsam gtan zab pa ni gter gsang ba lta bu'o/ /mnyam par 'jog pas mdzes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba lta bu'o/ /
158b3(mdo sde): shes rab zab cing yangs pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o/ /cis kyang mi chags pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /'bras bu dam pa'i rgyu dang nye ba ni me tog rgyas pa lta bu'o/ /mu stegs
158b4(mdo sde): can 'dul ba la seng ge'i rgyal po lta bu'o/ /lha'i bdud yongs su 'joms pa ni klu'am/ glang po che lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad gcod pa ni lha'i ral gri lta bu'o//
158b5(mdo sde): 'du 'dzi mang pos skyo ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lta bu'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru ba ni chu dang pa lta bu'o/ /mi gtsang ba 'i nyal nyil sel ba ni rlung drag po lta bu'o/ /kun
158b6(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pas glags mi gcod pa ni mtshon rnon po lta bu'o/ /'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba kun las srung ba ni gnyen nam/ mdza' bo lta bu'o/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra
158b7(mdo sde): las skyob pa ni 'obs sam/ mkhar lta bu'o/ /nyan nga ba thams cad las grol bar byed pas pha ma lta bu'o/ /zhan cings nyam chung rnams sbed pa ni nags stug po lta bu'o/ /dbyar
159a1(mdo sde): lam ring por 'gro ba ba la bsil grib kyi shing chen po lta bu'o/ /tsha ba dang / skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la cha grang lta bu'o/ /bkres pa rnams la
159a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu zhim po lta bu'o/ /gcer bu rnams la bgo ba'i gos byed pa'o/ /tshe bas nyen pa rnams la sprin stug por gyur pa'o/ /dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
159a3(mdo sde): po cher gyur pa'o/ /'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang / gnas su gyur pa'o/ /lo tog rnams la char par gyur ba'o/ /chu rnyog ma can rnams nor bu chu dang du gyur pa'o//
159a4(mdo sde): sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'gong bar byed pas spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor spro ba dang / tshim par byed pa'o/ /sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzam pa dang /
159a5(mdo sde): ngo tsha ba la bskul zhing 'dzud pa'o/ /bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa yongs su sel ba la skyug pa
159a6(mdo sde): dang / 'khru pa'i sman lta bur gyur pa'o/ /sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lta bur gyur pa'o/ /spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni zo chun rgyud pa'i
159a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo lta bu'o/ /dmigs pa la sems sdug pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtog pa lta bu'o/ /bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o/ /gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya
159b1(mdo sde): mtsho chen po lta bu'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sel ba ni ji ltar nyi ma tsha bas 'khyag pa cha mtshon/
159b2(mdo sde): bzhu ba lta bu'o/ /rtag tu bas ma gtan dang / gzugs med pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la rol cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che'i dam pa'i gling lta bur gyur
159b3(mdo sde): pas ched du ma brtsams kyang chos chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i yon tan gyi
159b4(mdo sde): khyad par tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de 'khor dang bcas te gnas 'dir phyir du nya bas 'od las 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul dang / ltas sngar bstan pa yin no/ /bcom
159b5(mdo sde): l dan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i yon tan mang po bshad ma thag tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'khor byang chub sems
159b6(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dge sbyong gi gzugs su ston cing lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ 'khor
159b7(mdo sde): mang po dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas/ 'greng
160a1(mdo sde): bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog /byams pa'i thugs kyis kun la skyob/ /sa
160a2(mdo sde): chen ltar ni shin tu bzod/ /zhe sdang khro ba'i sems kun bsal/ /mtshan dang dpe byad mchog ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rab brgyan/ /bden pa'i byams dang snying rje
160a3(mdo sde): yis| |rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'gengs/ /sred pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas/ /yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas/ /yongs su dag pa'i zhing spangs nas/ /rnyog pa can gyi sems
160a4(mdo sde): can dgrol/ / rnyog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te/ /ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad/ /yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis/ /ring mo zhig nas dka' thub spyad/ /yun ring
160a5(mdo sde): dka' thub spyad pa dang / /thos nas 'jigs pa'i sems kyang skye/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab bskyed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
160a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / tshad med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchod/ /gzhan yang skye bo mang po dag /bkres sko ma na 'chi kun las bsgral// so so'i skye bo gzhan gyi phyir/ /lus
160a7(mdo sde): srog ma chags mang du btang / /yang dag dam pa'i chos tshol phyir/ /sha dang rus pa'ang mang du btang / /bdag gi bde ba kun btang nas/ /skye bo rnams la thugs brtser
160b1(mdo sde): dgongs/ /so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir/ /the tshom dra ba gcod la brtson/ /dbang po drug rnams rab bsdams nas/ /'dong ba thams cad ring du spangs/ /'dus byas mi rtag sdug
160b2(mdo sde): bsngal te/ /bdag med stong pa nyid du rtogs/ /sdug bsngal las kun skye ba yi/ /rgyu ni 'dod chags sred pa'o/ /de phyir dbang po drug pas sngar/ /'dod chags yongs su gcad
160b3(mdo sde): par bya/ /sems can gnas pa'i khams kun tu/ /rtag par thugs rje chen pos gnas/ /byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang / /sngon gyi smon lam kun mi gtong / /sems
160b4(mdo sde): can gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis/ /rnam par gzir ba dag gzigs nas/ /shin tu 'bab pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /de las sgrol phyir rab tu brtson/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims
160b5(mdo sde): bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas/ /ji ltar ma ni bu gcig la/ /byams pa'i sems kyi gso bzhin du/ /sngon yang sems can ris kun la/ /
160b6(mdo sde): rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas/ /de phyir myur du sangs rgyas nas/ /tshad med pa yi 'khor rnams sgrol// ji tsam byang chub spyod bsgoms pa/ /sems can don du ma bsngos
160b7(mdo sde): med| |de bas sems can thams cad la/ /pha rol phyin pa drug mi gtong / /rtag tu dus ngan tha ma'i tshe/ /bla med byang chub bsgrubs pas na/ /da yang dus ngan tha ma'i tshe/ /bla med
161a1(mdo sde): byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/ /ngan par lta ba'i lta klu mi/ /gnod sbyin dag ni kun btul te/ /the tshom gcod cing bder bkod pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i lam
161a2(mdo sde): la'o/ /tshad med pa yi skye bo dag /byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston/ /mchod 'os 'dren pa'i gtsor gyur te/ /mchog gi bsod nams zhing du gyur/ /dpe zla med pa'i bcom
161a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ /byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyob/ /tshad med grags pa chen po yis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yongs su khyab/ /de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bdag
161a4(mdo sde): gi don du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /kun nas lhan cig 'dir 'dus nas/ /thub pa chen po spyan sngar lhags/ /dam pa'i chos rnams thos nas ni/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te//
161a5(mdo sde): lhag par yang dag brtson bskyed nas/ /byang chub spyod la nan tan bgyid/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus/ /thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas/ /de bas deng 'dir
161a6(mdo sde): 'dren khyod kyis/ /bsdus pa'i 'khor ni sngon ma byung / /gnod sbyin khri phrag bcu gsum snyed/ /rtag tu sha za khrag 'thung ba/ /thams cad sdig pa'i las btang nas/ /byang chub
161a7(mdo sde): chen por 'bab cing gzhol/ /kha cig khyad par gzugs mchog dang / /bzod pa ting nge 'dzin yang thob/ /kha cig zag pa kun zad nas/ /'jig rten mchog gi dgra bcom
161b1(mdo sde): gyur| |kha cig tshad med bzhi bsgoms shing / /kha cig bsdu ba bzhi la gnas/ /kha cig yang dag rigs bzhi thob/ /kha cig mthun pa'i bzod la gnas/ /kha cig dpa' 'grol
161b2(mdo sde): ting 'dzin thob/ /kha cig shes rab mig dang ldan/ /kha cig mi skye bzod la gnas/ /de kun 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs/ /bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus/ /bdud kyi
161b3(mdo sde): 'khor rnams bcom nas su/ /rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga yi/ /mu stegs can gyi ris kun btul/ /sems can dmyal ba byol song dang / /yi dwags lha min rgyud kun bcom/ /bde
161b4(mdo sde): bas sems can bden pa rnams/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags/ /nad dang mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / /mu ges 'jigs pa'ang deng 'dir bcil/ /sems can mdongs
161b5(mdo sde): shing 'thom pa dang / /yang dag lam ni stor ba bsgrol/ /nyon mongs myos shing 'khrugs pa dag /thams cad zhi ba'i lam la bkod/ /bdag gi bya ba kun spangs te/ /lhags nas
161b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan zhabs la thug / dpag tu med pa'i zhing rnams na/ /bcom ldan da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnams/ /thams cad khyod la kun bsngags bas/ /thos nas thams cad 'di
161b7(mdo sde): ru lugs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rgya mtsho yi/ /yang dag yon tan tshad ma mchis/ /sems can mang po'i don mdzad pa/ /mos pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshad med bsod
162a1(mdo sde): nams rdzogs bgyis pas/ /bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal gyur/ /tshad med bskal pa'i bar du yang / /mchod pa mang pos mchod par shog /bdag
162a2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan ji bzhin du/ /de lta bu yi yi dam bcas/ /rnyog pa can gyi 'jig rten 'dir/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
162a3(mdo sde): po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'khor dang bcas te/ gzhan yang / lha rdzas kyi bsung dang / me tog
162a4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i rgyan tshad med pa snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs su gyur te/ dam pa'i chos
162a5(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci'ang mi smra bar 'dug go / de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
162a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / /na bza' dang /
162a7(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pa phul te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
162b1(mdo sde): bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to/
162b2(mdo sde): zhes smra'o/ /de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa stan las langs nas gos
162b3(mdo sde): tshags bcos te phrag pa g.yas pa phyung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
162b4(mdo sde): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis/ gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ ji
162b5(mdo sde): srid cig na mchis/ yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon
162b6(mdo sde): tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur/ bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du'i gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ /
162b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ thongs shig /skyes bu chen po 'di'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi'i 'khor thams cad
163a1(mdo sde): kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na 'jig
163a2(mdo sde): rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tshom 'dri bas yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan
163a3(mdo sde): 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas
163a4(mdo sde): khyod la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/ /ji ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /'di lta ste/ dpa' bar 'gro
163a5(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lnga shin tu rtogs par 'jug pa'o/ /mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang
163a6(mdo sde): thob pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la bzod pa thob pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i
163a7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting 'dzin la'ang shin tu gnas pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la'ang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o/ /mu
163b1(mdo sde): stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshoms pa ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du de gnas par
163b2(mdo sde): byed do/ /skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gnas te/ gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par
163b3(mdo sde): gyur pas gdul ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag yongs su smin par byed do/ /skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/
163b4(mdo sde): gal te ye shes mngon par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mthun
163b5(mdo sde): par ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te dpag tu med pa'i
163b6(mdo sde): y e shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci nus pa bzhin du
163b7(mdo sde): tshad med pa'i yo byad dam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de
164a1(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rnam par dag pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i
164a2(mdo sde): m thus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mthun par 'dod pa'i spyod yul gyi nyes pa'i skyon tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam par
164a3(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te khrel ba dang / ngo cha ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i
164a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba dang ldan
164a5(mdo sde): zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang yongs su bral nas bsam pa mi nyams par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur
164a6(mdo sde): t e| gal te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa bsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
164a7(mdo sde): thangs mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mngon par shes pa dang /
164b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur
164b2(mdo sde): t e| |gal te mya ngan med pa'i mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i
164b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mya ngan dang / yi mug pa dang / rmugs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du
164b4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gal te mngon par shes pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams
164b5(mdo sde): cad thabs mkhas pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten
164b6(mdo sde): kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun pa dang bral te/ sangs rgyas kyi
164b7(mdo sde): zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de
165a1(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi
165a2(mdo sde): zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad log par lta ba yongs su spangs nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa
165a3(mdo sde): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing
165a4(mdo sde): de dag gi ri khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri rab lhun po dang / de ma yin pa'i ri gzhan dang / lung pa dang / lung phran dang / gcong rong dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / tsher ma dang / rtswa
165a5(mdo sde): dang / shing ngan pa thams cad mi snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji tsam du ngan par gdags pa dug dang / byad stems dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / ye 'brog dang / glo bur
165a6(mdo sde): dang / rims nad dang / yul ngan pa dang / nam rmus pa dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad kyang zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi
165a7(mdo sde): zhing de'i sa gzhi'ang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam zhing bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / phul du 'gyur ba dang / dam
165b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma bzang po du mas yongs su brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te ye shes
165b2(mdo sde): k yi stobs gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i bdud kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te
165b3(mdo sde): thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te
165b4(mdo sde): g log gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'jig rten pha rol
165b5(mdo sde): gyi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing chos kyis spro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog dam pa'i ro dang
165b6(mdo sde): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bsams pa bzhin du zas dang / skom
165b7(mdo sde): gyis tshim par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog gi mdangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
166a1(mdo sde): l a snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad gang yang lhag pa'i mthu stobs
166a2(mdo sde): dang mi ldan pa med de/ nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te
166a3(mdo sde): mchog dam pa'i yo byad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci
166a4(mdo sde): la mos pa bzhin du khri stan dang / gding ba dang / gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / ci tsam du 'tsho ba'i yo byad du gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis brel zhing phongs
166a5(mdo sde): pa med de rab tu mdzes pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te
166a6(mdo sde): r tsod pa med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
166a7(mdo sde): lus dang / sems zo mdog bde zhing yang ba dang / dgra sdang ba dang / 'ching ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'dum zhing dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul
166b1(mdo sde): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems mi 'khrug pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du
166b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te phul du gyur pa'i spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
166b3(mdo sde): dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad khyad par can gyi rab tu dga' ba tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du
166b4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'od ces phya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams
166b5(mdo sde): cad thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob cing rnam par dag pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur
166b6(mdo sde): te/ gal te rgyal ba'i rdo rje la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams
166b7(mdo sde): cad dbang po kun dang ldan zhing dbang po mi nyams pa dang / rtag tu yang dag par 'byung ba'i lam la mos shing sems rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du
167a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te lhag pa'i rgyal mtshan rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting
167a2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bdag sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la shin tu skyo zhing mi 'dod pa dang / thams cad kyang
167a3(mdo sde): dge ba srung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal
167a4(mdo sde): te byams pa dang / snying rjer ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
167a5(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / gnod pa'am/ 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / kun la snyoms pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig phan pa dang / bde bar byed
167a6(mdo sde): pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te bsod nams thams cad shin tu sdud pa zhes bya ba'i
167a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / nad dang / mu ge dang yongs su bral te/ dus
167b1(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / kha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / tsha ba dang / sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i reg bya'i yul yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de
167b2(mdo sde): l tar skyes bu chen po de gal te rgya mtsho glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sa chen po thams cad rin po
167b3(mdo sde): che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas par 'gyur zhing nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang yongs su bral te rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i shing dang / gos kyi shing dang / snod kyi shing dang /
167b4(mdo sde): rgyan gyi shing dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su brgyan par gyur to//
167b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ mdor na/ rigs kyi bu de ni sems can mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyin re zhing snga dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi ting nge 'dzin la
167b6(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug ste/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun na gdul ba'i sems can thams cad la ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang / bde
167b7(mdo sde): ba'i don de dang / de dag gis yongs su smin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med dpag tu med pa'i bar du rnyog ba lnga'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs
168a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mtshon gyis
168a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa byung ste/ sems can dag yongs su gdungs par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus mtshon gyis 'jigs
168a3(mdo sde): pa de dag yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis snying brtse bar byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams la lar nad kyis 'jigs pa byung ste/
168a4(mdo sde): sems can kha btag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus nad kyis 'jigs pa yongs su bcil nas sems can
168a5(mdo sde): rnams rab tu bde ba thob par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mu ges 'jigs pa byung ste sems can/ kha btag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas
168a6(mdo sde): snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus mu ges 'jigs pa yongs su bcil te sems can rnams kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'dis de ltar ting
168a7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin mang po'i shugs kyis de lta bu la sogs pa tshad med dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyis sems can gyi dbugs 'byin to/ /rigs
168b1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di de ltar nan tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar byed pa'i don la rab tu
168b2(mdo sde): brtson pa'o/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
168b3(mdo sde): snyed las zad mi shes pa'i yid ma chen po bcas te snying rje chen po dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rab tu bskyed do/ /de ltar snying rje chen po dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson
168b4(mdo sde): 'grus bskyed de zad mi shes pa'i yi dam bcas pas gong nas gong du 'phags pa'i shugs kyis nyin zhag gcig gam/ skad cig thang cig tsam gyis kyang so so'i skye bo tshad med
168b5(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig btul te/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs las bsgral nas thams cad ci dang / ci 'dod pa de dang / de dag gis re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gnas gang dag na
168b6(mdo sde): sems can gang 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal te/ 'dod pas yongs su gdungs par gyur pa dag sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
168b7(mdo sde): sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing / dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na ci dang / ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing sdug bsngal dang bral te/ skal pa ji lta
169a1(mdo sde): ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang bza' ba dang / btung
169a2(mdo sde): b as phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te
169a3(mdo sde): mchod pa byas na ci dang / ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan te mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
169a4(mdo sde): gnas gang dag na sems can gang bgo ba'am/ rin po che'i rgyan nam/ nad kyi rkyen sman nam/ gding ba'am/ khri stan nam/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel cing phongs par gyur pa dag gis
169a5(mdo sde): sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas mchod pa byas na ci dang / ci 'dod pa rnyed
169a6(mdo sde): cing bgo ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / gding ba dang / khri dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor cing skal pa ji lta ba bzhin mtho ris kyi lhar skye
169a7(mdo sde): ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag byams sdug pa dang bral te/ dgra sdang bar gyur pa dang phrad par gyur pa
169b1(mdo sde): dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas nas/ byams sdug
169b2(mdo sde): pa dang phrad cing dgra sdang ba dang bral te/ skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang
169b3(mdo sde): dag lus dang / sems nad dang / sdug bsngal mang pos gzir bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod
169b4(mdo sde): cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na de kun lus dang / sems bde zhing nad thams cad dang bral te skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan
169b5(mdo sde): las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'thab cing rtsod par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
169b6(mdo sde): chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang bral te gcig la gcig dga' ba dang / bzod pa dang /
169b7(mdo sde): gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis 'gyod cing chags par 'gyur te skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
170a1(mdo sde): gnas gang dag na sems can gang btson du bzung ste btson rar bcug gam/ lcags dang / khong sgril dang / shing gi gdos kyis bcings sam/ yan
170a2(mdo sde): l ag bcings te sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti
170a3(mdo sde): stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun btson ra dang / lcags dang / khong sgril dang / lcags sgrog las thar te bag yangs su gyur nas dga' ba dang / skal pa ji lta ba
170a4(mdo sde): bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag btson du bzung nas gzhu ba'am/ 'tshog
170a5(mdo sde): pa'am/ nan la bor ba dang / gsod pa la thug pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs
170a6(mdo sde): pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun btson du bzung ba dang / gzhu 'tshog pa dang / nan la bor ba las thams cad thar te skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho
170a7(mdo sde): ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag lus dang / sems dub pa dang / mthu stobs dang mi ldan cing /
170b1(mdo sde): nyam chung ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas
170b2(mdo sde): na de kun lus dang / sems yang zhing bde ba dang / mthu stobs bskyed de cis 'dul ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas
170b3(mdo sde): gang dag na sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / ma tshang bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing
170b4(mdo sde): dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun dbang po ma tshang ba med cing dbang po dang ldan te skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan
170b5(mdo sde): las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag smyos shing sems 'khrugs sam/ 'byung po'i gdon gyis brlams pa dag gis sems
170b6(mdo sde): rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun smyos shing sems
170b7(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa dang bral te rab tu bde ba dang / skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can
171a1(mdo sde): gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khong khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / ngan par lta ba dang / gnyid dang / bag
171a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / the tshom la sogs pas lus dang / sems gdungs te mi bde bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying
171a3(mdo sde): po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral te lus dang / sems rab tu bde ba dang / skal pa
171a4(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag mes tshig par gyur pa'am/ chus
171a5(mdo sde): khyer ba'am/ rlung gis khyer ba'am/ rbab tu lhung ba'am/ shing ka'am/ khang thog nas lhung ste sems dngangs shing 'khums par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu

178a2(mdo sde): pa sbyong ba dge bar gsungs/ /'byung ba chen po sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs/ /ngan par 'gro ba sbyong ba dge bar gsungs/ /sdig pa'i bag chags sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs/ /
178a3(mdo sde): re ba rdzogs par byed pa dge bar gsungs/ /lo tog smin par byed pa'ang dge bar gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dge bar gsungs pa 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun
178a4(mdo sde): gyis byin brlabs pa/ /dge bar gsungs 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i rnams/ /byin gyis rlob mdzad rjes su yi rang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar me dang / chu dang ldan
178a5(mdo sde): pa dang / bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po gzungs kyi tshig 'di ni bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang+gA'i
178a6(mdo sde): bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis pas thos so/ /gzungs 'di ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid pa nas de bzhin du rgyas pa'i longs spyod pa'i yo
178a7(mdo sde): byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs 'dis ni chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas su
178b1(mdo sde): gyur pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i dmigs pa 'phel bar bgyid pa nas de bzhin du rgyas par 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad
178b2(mdo sde): kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do/ /gzungs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi lta bu yongs su rgyas pa dang / yun du gnas shing khams gsum
178b3(mdo sde): gyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po dang /
178b4(mdo sde): gzungs kyi tshig 'di smras pa na/ ri kha la ti ya rab tu g.yos nas lha'i rol mo bye ba khrag khrig kyang ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol te/ lha'i spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che tshad
178b5(mdo sde): med pa rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du babs nas de'i tshe 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to/ /de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na lha mo bkra shis
178b6(mdo sde): chen mo dang / dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang / mchod dbyangs lha mo chen mo dang / brtan ma lha mo chen mo dang / chu can lha mo chen mo dang / 'od chen lha mo chen mo la sogs pa lha
178b7(mdo sde): m o 'byung ba chen po bzhi la dbang du gyur pa stong phrag bco brgyad 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang
179a1(mdo sde): dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa/
179a2(mdo sde): bdag gis 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag la dbang sgyur mod kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa'i
179a3(mdo sde): phyogs mi 'tshal te/ skyes bu chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i mtshan nyid
179a4(mdo sde): dang | skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs
179a5(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i mtshan nyid skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / mthun
179a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so/ /lha mo/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni yon tan mang po dang ldan pas rin
179a7(mdo sde): po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste/ sems can mang po la sbyin pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di'ang de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
179b1(mdo sde): char bzhin du 'bebs te sems can la sbyin pa byed do/ /'di lta ste/ rin po che'i gling ltar rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang byang chub
179b2(mdo sde): kyi yan lag rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan no/ /'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi shing pa ri ci tri la bsung dang / me tog gis mdzes pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos
179b3(mdo sde): rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes so/ /'di lta ste/ seng ge'i rgyal po ni ri dwags thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non cing mi skrag pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sems
179b4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis bag tsha ba'am/ zil gyis non pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ ji ltar nyi ma gsal bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa thams cad yongs su sel ba bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang
179b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi ngan par lta ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ nam thang ba'i zla ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su lam stor ba'i sems can thams cad la
179b6(mdo sde): bde ba'i lam ston te/ gar 'gro bar dga' ba bzhin du phyin par 'gyur ba ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'ang ma rig pa'i mtshan mor theg pa gsum las 'brog bslad de 'khor ba'i
179b7(mdo sde): ' brog dgon par 'khyam pa'i sems can thams cad la theg pa gsum gyis yang dag pa'i lam ston cing skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du thabs kyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i lam la
180a1(mdo sde): 'god par byed do/ 'di lta ste/ sa chen po la ni sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang / rtsi shing dang / lo tog dang / sa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems
180a2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba ltar rigs kyi bu 'di la'ang byang chub kyi yan lag khyad par can gyi chos thams cad ston pa'i gnas so/ /'di lta ste/ rin po che chen po'i
180a3(mdo sde): r i rab ri'i rgyal po ni shin tu brtan cing ma god ma nyams pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu gnas shing sems can
180a4(mdo sde): thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong ba'i phyir ma god pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la sems can
180a5(mdo sde): thams cad spyod pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di'ang sems can thams cad de la longs spyod do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/ /de'i
180a6(mdo sde): tshe 'khor mang po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa bstod pa thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ bkur
180a7(mdo sde): sti dang / rim gro byas nas rab tu dga' bas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la mig mi 'dzum par lta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag
180b1(mdo sde): gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu yang dag sa yi snying po ni/ /yon tan mang po phun sum tshogs par ldan/ /dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing
180b2(mdo sde): ston byed pa/ /ston pa chen po la ni phyag 'tshal lhags/ /sems can kun la bde ba rab tu byin/ /srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun las sgrol/ /tshad med rnam pa sna tshogs
180b3(mdo sde): char phab nas/ /ston pa chen po la ni mchod pa byed/ /brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa des/ /phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas shing brtags nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang rab
180b4(mdo sde): bcas te/ /ston pa chen po la ni bsngags shing bstod/ /bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mthong ba/ /nor bu rin po che yi 'od zer ltar/ /sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing kun
180b5(mdo sde): snang byas te/ /thams cad gsal bar ma gyur gang yang med/ /mngon shes drug gis 'jig rten snang bar byed/ /deng 'dir 'dus shing lhags par gyur pa ni/ /shin tu dpa' ba
180b6(mdo sde): sa yi snying po ste/ /rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam rnam par ston/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun 'byung ba'i gter yin te/ /'jigs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nga ro dbyangs/ /byang chub sems
180b7(mdo sde): dpa' mang po'i rgyal mtshan te/ /sems can mang po 'dren pa'i gtso bo'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i rin chen 'byung khungs te/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho yin/ /
181a1(mdo sde): byams pa'i blo gros snying rje brtse la mos/ /sdug bsngal ba yi sems can mang po sgrol/ /'jigs pa srung ba'i 'obs dang mkhar yin te/ /nam mkha'
181a2(mdo sde): dang ba'i zla bzhin lam yang ston/ /sa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed/ /rdo rje ltar ni the tshom yongs su gcod/ /rnam par grol ba'i rin chen kun la gtong / /chu ltar sgrib
181a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad 'dag par byed/ /nyon mongs tsha bas gdungs pa'i gdugs su 'gyur/ /sman pa ltar ni nad kun 'tsho bar byed/ /zhag gcig sa yi snying po'i ming brjod pa'i/ /grags
181a4(mdo sde): pa chen po'i bsod nams thob pa ni/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig par du yang / /blo can gzhan gyi ming nas brjod pas lhags/ /so so'i skye bo grol bar byed pa ni/ /nyon mongs
181a5(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par 'ching byed pa'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin mthar phyin cing / /ting 'dzin gzhan dag gi yang pha rol phyin/ /rkyen mang bcu gsum po yang rnam dag
181a6(mdo sde): pas| |mang po kun la ye shes nam mkha' bzhin/ /dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams kyi/ /skye bo mang po'i mun pa'i tshogs kyang bcom/ /zhing rnams ji bzhin
181a7(mdo sde): ting 'dzin der 'jug cing / /bsam gtan bzhi po la yang rgyun du 'jug /ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sems can gyi/ /nyon mongs pa yi gdung ba rab tu sel/ /so so'i skye
181b1(mdo sde): po sngon gyi sdig pa'i las/ /mtshon dang nad dang mu ges 'jigs pa dang / /rnam pa mang pos 'tshe zhing gsod gyur pa/ /de dag kun nas rnam par grol bar byed/ /sems can nye
181b2(mdo sde): bar len pa'i phung po lnga/ /sdug bsngal mang pos 'tshe zhing gdungs gyur pa/ /sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /sems can
181b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'khor lo rab bskor te/ /gcig gis gcig la 'tshe zhing gnod gyur ba/ /sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/ /bzod cing byams pa'i sems la gnas par 'gyur/ /
181b4(mdo sde): bcu gsum rkyen gyis rab 'jigs skrag byed cing / /tshol ba mi rnyed rkyen gyis sdug pa dag /sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/ /'jigs pa med la bde bar gnas par 'gyur//
181b5(mdo sde): bsod nams byed la mos shing dran pa dang / /tshul khrims mang thos shes rab 'dod pa dag /sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/ /re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/ /yon
181b6(mdo sde): tan so sor smos pa'i bzod rtsal dang / /sman dang sa bon tshogs la mos pa dag /sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/ /re ba kun dang ldan zhing rdzogs par 'gyur/ /lo tog rtsi
181b7(mdo sde): shing legs par 'dod pa dang / /khye'u dang bu me gos dang bran khol phyir/ /sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/ /re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/ /yon tan mang po kun
182a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pas na/ /sa chen 'di yang mi gtong rab tu 'dzin/ /de yi rkyen gyis sman dang lo thog rnams/ /snum zhing 'jam la ro dang ldan par 'gyur//
182a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs mang pos bsgribs par gyur nas su/ /mi dge bcu yi las la mos pa dag /sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na/ /mi dge nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /rnam
182a3(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kun gyi lus ston cing / /skye bo mang po dag la chos kyang ston/ /sbyin pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas ni/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bde bar 'gyur/ /
182a4(mdo sde): gal te bskal ba mang po brgya yi bar/ /de yi yon tan bsngags shing rab bstod de/ /mthar phyin rdzogs par 'gyur ba shin tu dka'/ /de bas kun gyis bsti stang bcas pas mchod//
182a5(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas
182a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po stan las langs te bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ pus
182a7(mdo sde): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /yon tan tshad med rgya mtsho can/ /bcom ldan 'das la zhu
182b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ /the tshom nem nur ci mchis pa/ /bdag la rgyas par bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu yang dag pa/ khyod ni chos thams cad ye shes
182b2(mdo sde): kyis mthong ba la thogs pa med do/ /'on kyang sems can la pan pa dang / bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang / ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / bcom ldan 'das
182b3(mdo sde): kyis dris pa de dang / de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag
182b4(mdo sde): sngon bskal pa bcu gsum du/ /spyod pa dka' ba shin tu spyod/ /so so'i skye bo kun don du/ /'jigs pa gsum dang rnyog lnga gsal/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la/ /tshang ma
182b5(mdo sde): mchis pa'i mchod bgyis pas/ /bsam pa dag pa'i 'khor 'di dang / /tshogs chen 'dus pa'ang sngon mthong ngo / /blo can brtson 'grus rtsol ba dag /thams cad 'dus shing tshogs
182b6(mdo sde): 'dir lhags/ /shin tu skyon med 'khor 'di dag /mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar rmad/ /ci slad sangs rgyas zhing 'di kun/ /sdig pas dge ba nyams bgyis shing / /blo can dag
182b7(mdo sde): gis spangs pa yi/ /ngan par spyod kun lhan cig gnas/ /mtshams med sdig pa bgyid pa dang / /yang dag dam pa'i chos la skur/ /'phags la smod cing log lta bas/ /rtag dang
183a1(mdo sde): chad pa'i gtsug lag 'chad/ /sdig pa bcu yi las bgyid cing / /'jig rten phyi mas mi 'jigs pa/ /theg pa rnam gsum ring spangs shing / /sdig
183a2(mdo sde): can dag la ngan 'gror gzhol/ /ma rig pas ni bsgribs pa'i mig /'dod chags phrag dog rgyus 'tsho ba/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab bskor te/ /sems can 'di dag sgrol bar
183a3(mdo sde): mdzad/ /ji ltar nying mtshams sbyor ba yi/ /nyon mongs rdo rje lta bus bcad/ /ji lta bur na gzungs dag 'thob/ /de bzhin bzod pa'ang nges par 'gyur/ /bdag gis 'dren pa
183a4(mdo sde): tshogs chen dag / mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar che/ /'di 'dra'i yon tan kun tshogs pa/ /phyogs gzhan dag na ma mthong ngo / /yon tan mang po kun ldan zhing / /byang chub
183a5(mdo sde): lam la rab brtson pas/ /ji ltar byis pa'i 'khor dag la/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /
183a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi sngon 'das pa'i dus na'ang chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag gi zhing na rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma
183a7(mdo sde): snyed la sngon 'di lta bu'i don dag zhu ba zhus so/ /khyod kyis dres pa'i don 'di dag la sngon yang nan tan shin tu byas pas shin tu rtogs shing khong du chud do/ /spyod pa mang po
183b1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin pas shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i don 'thob par bya
183b2(mdo sde): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i gter sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can
183b3(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
183b4(mdo sde): bskur ba'i rgyal po spyod pa mi dge ba la gnas pa thams cad ngan song gsum las bzlog cing mi ltung bar bya ba dang / zhing 'dir dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung shin tu rgyas
183b5(mdo sde): shing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i don dris pa legs so/ /shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
183b6(mdo sde): ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka'
183b7(mdo sde): stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyi sems can
184a1(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad las phyir ldog pa dang / 'phags pa'i nor rin po che bdun gyis bral ba dang / mkhas pa dag dang
184a2(mdo sde): ring du gyur pa chad pa dang / rtag pa'i dra bas kun nas glags pa dang / ngan song du 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro zhing dga' ba dang / skye ba phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs par mi lta ba
184a3(mdo sde): dang | ma rig pa'i mun nag thibs po la gnas pa la dad pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos la
184a4(mdo sde): skur cing 'phags pa la dbang zab/ dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du spong zhing mi dge ba'i chos rdzogs par byed pa'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna
184a5(mdo sde): tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing na bzhugs kyang rab tu bde bar bzhugs te/ bag tsha ba med pa dang / 'jigs skrag pa med pas drang srong chen po'i gnas su phyin te sangs rgyas kyi
184a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang / bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas/ so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rigs la nyon mongs pa shin tu sra ba rdo rje
184a7(mdo sde): lta bu dag bsal nas ci la mos pa bzhin du so sor bkod do/ /mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di
184b1(mdo sde): lta ste/ yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad bdag gi dmag dang / gzhan gyi dmag gis yongs su gtses shing nyon mongs pa dang / sdug
184b2(mdo sde): bsngal bar gyur te/ de na gnas pa'i mi mang po'ang mi bde bas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / gcig la gcig smod pa tshad med pa snyed 'byung ste/ brdzun du smra ba dang / g.yo sgyu
184b3(mdo sde): dang | tshig rtsub par smra ba dang / skur klad 'debs shing 'khrugs pa dang / dmus long dang / ling tog can du 'gyur ba dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / grang ba
184b4(mdo sde): dang | tsha ba'i nad ma rungs pa dang / ri mus rnam pa mang po dang / smyo ba dang / skem byed dang / kha zas mi 'ju ba dang / sems 'khrug cing myos pa dang / dbang po ma tshang zhing yan
184b5(mdo sde): lag dang / nying lag nyams pa dang / bgo ba dang / bza' ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phongs shing brel te/ bdog pa thams cad yid du mi 'ong ba dang / skye bo
184b6(mdo sde): thams cad mu stegs can dang / 'jig rten gyi lha la skyabs su song zhing lta ba ngan pa dang / bsam pa ngan pa dang / mos pa ngan pa yongs su rgyas te/ yang dag pa'i lam stor nas
184b7(mdo sde): ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba na/ de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i rgan po blo dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa/ mang du thos pa/ drang dag na che ba dag 'dus nas gros su bgros te/ yul dang /
185a1(mdo sde): grong mi kun bsdus nas thams cad kyis mthun par rgyal bu gcig btus pa ni sngon sbyin pa rab tu byas pa/ tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs pa/ brtson
185a2(mdo sde): 'grus la brtun pa/ shin tu dka' ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ mchog tu gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan pa/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag ma nyams pa/ lus
185a3(mdo sde): byad che chung ran pa/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/ phul du gyur pa'i mdog dam pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyis bkur sti dang / rim gro byed pa/ yul de na gnas pa'i
185a4(mdo sde): mi thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing lta 'dod pa/ rang bzhin gyis drang zhing brtan pa/ byams pa dang / snying rjer ldan pa/ mang du thos pa/ rtsal thams cad dang ldan pa/ ngang des pa'i bzod
185a5(mdo sde): pas sems rab tu brgyan pa/ btsun mo dam pa'i sras thu bor gyur pa/ spos dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i chus lus bkrus nas/ rin po ches brgyan pa'i gos dam
185a6(mdo sde): pa spos kyis bdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gyon zhing / nor bu rin po che spyi bo'i gtsug phud la btags pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gser gyi cod pan mgo la
185a7(mdo sde): thogs pa/ rab tu yang la 'jam pa'i dar gyis bcings pa/ gzhan yang nor bu rin po che dang / mu tig dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas
185b1(mdo sde): pa'i rna cha dang / se mo do dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu la sogs pa thogs pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i lham gyis rkang pa bteg pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
185b2(mdo sde): las byas pa'i gdugs kyis steng gi bla bres bres pa/ sngon lha dang / drang srong thams cad kyis bsrung zhing 'dzin pa'i khri bshams pa/ brgya byin la sogs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing skyob
185b3(mdo sde): pa| bzo shin tu mkhas pas las su byas pa'i gzhal med khang chen por sngon rgyal po snga ma 'dug 'dug pa'i khri la bzhag nas rgyal por bcug go / rgyal sar zhugs nas lha'i
185b4(mdo sde): dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / grul bum gyi dbang pos srung zhing 'dzin pa'i dril bu dang / rnga chen po brdungs nas de'i sgras
185b5(mdo sde): yul khams kun tu grags par gyur te/ rgyal rigs la sogs pa rigs chen po bzhi la gtogs pa'i mi tshad med pa snyed lus yang dag par bkrus nas gos gtsang ma gyon te/ lag
185b6(mdo sde): na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / nor bu rin po che dang / mu tig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / baiDUR+ya
185b7(mdo sde): la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed thogs te rgyal po de la phul lo/ /gzhan yang / rigs mtho zhing btsun pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba'i 'am ze thams cad
186a1(mdo sde): kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang / glu dang / dbyangs dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis rgyal po de la bstod pa byas so/ /legs par 'gyur pa rnam pa
186a2(mdo sde): sna tshogs thob par gyur cig ces smon lam yang btab bo/ /bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po'i spyi bor gtor to/ /rgyal po snga ma'i blon po'i rigs la gtogs pa
186a3(mdo sde): thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba/ drang ba/ g.yo med pa/ mdzangs pa dag kyang ci rigs su blon por rim par phye ste bcug nas/ rgyal po'i las byed pas sngon yul de na bdag
186a4(mdo sde): dang | gzhan gyi dmag thams cad kyis gtse bar 'gyur ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / grogs po ngan pa thams cad med par byas nas phas rgol ba'i dgra dang / gnod pa byed pa thams
186a5(mdo sde): cad zhi bar gyur nas/ nag po'i phyogs thams cad byang zhing rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad skyes te 'phel bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo
186a6(mdo sde): nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de lta bu'i 'khor lo gcig dang ldan na/ 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi rgyal srid rab tu che zhing phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad shin
186a7(mdo sde): tu thul ba las tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas mi bzhugs
186b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshe/ de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad rang gi sems kyi bag la nyal ba'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bcings nas nang gi dgra dang / pha rol gyi dgras rnam par gtses te/ kun
186b2(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs nas gti mug gis ldongs te/ mi bde bar gyur pas rtag pa dang / chad pa la rnam par zhen cing chags pa tshad med pa bskyed nas phan tshun rtsod cing
186b3(mdo sde): 'gal bar byed de/ gcig la gcig dbang za zhing smod pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bskyed de/ g.yo dang / sgyu'i tshul du smra zhing mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs
186b4(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / rnam par zhen cing chags pa'i skye bo dag nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang ldan pas yang dag pa'i
186b5(mdo sde): chos kyi mig ldongs te/ zhe sdang dang / khong khro bas gdungs shing 'khrugs kyang yang dag pa bden pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed de/ yang dag pa'i chos kyi ro yongs su gtang nas
186b6(mdo sde): dge ba byed pa la dbang za zhing smod de/ /de sngar bde zhing skyid pas ni bral cing phongs par 'gyur gyi/ rtag tu nyon mongs pa'i dra ba rnam pa mang pos dkris shing glags nas mu stegs can
