335b1(mdo sde): ba yin te/ byang chub kyi rgyu dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i them skas lta bu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te sems skyed pa tsam mam/ smon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las
335b2(mdo sde): kyi lam goms par nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar thob tu zin na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
335b3(mdo sde): k yi zhing thams cad sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta
335b4(mdo sde): bu'i gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / yon tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /rigs
335b5(mdo sde): k yi bu| gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi bskal par bdag ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes
335b6(mdo sde): zer te/ 'chad dam/ nyan tam/ sems bskyed dam/ smon lam btab kyang byang chub dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
335b7(mdo sde): las 'don mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byas pas 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang / bram ze la sogs pa rigs chen po dang / rgyal chen ris
336a1(mdo sde): bzhi'i lha nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng gi bar du yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na
336a2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang yod par 'gyur te/ de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang / bye brag
336a3(mdo sde): las gyur to/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan
336a4(mdo sde): te| mi dge ba bcu'i sdom pa la mi gnas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang myur du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul du chud par 'dod
336a5(mdo sde): dam| myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod dam/ myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na sngar dge ba bcu'i las
336a6(mdo sde): kyi lam shin tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang / yon tan rnam par gzhag pa'i gzhi dang / 'jig rten
336a7(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ /de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
336b1(mdo sde): kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing / byang chub chen po 'thob 'dod pa/ /dge bcu'i 'khor lo'i nan
336b2(mdo sde): tan la/ /le lo ma byed brtson par gyis/ /theg pa gsum gyis dam chos dang / /theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang / /rab tu byung ba thams cad la/ /'khrul pa med par 'thob par
336b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /theg chen spyod la dad mos shing / /thams cad 'khor gyi dbugs 'byin pa'i/ /chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der/ /byang chub chen po myur du 'thob/ /gal te srog
336b4(mdo sde): gcod yongs spangs na/ /kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed/ /rtag tu nad med tshe yang ring / /bde zhing skyid la gnod pa med/ /skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas spyod
336b5(mdo sde): yul lam la mos/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong / /myur du bla med byang chub 'thob/ /ma byin len pa yongs spangs na/ /mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed/ /'dod chags
336b6(mdo sde): skye ba'i lam kun zhi/ /'dod chags med pa skye bar 'gyur/ /skye ba kun tu longs spyod ldan/ /sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te/ /rin chen mang pos brgyan pa dang / /yid 'ong sangs
336b7(mdo sde): rgyas zhing yang 'theb/ /'dod pas log g.yem yongs spangs na/ /nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags srid pa'i mtsho yang skems/ /rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing myur
337a1(mdo sde): 'thob/ /sems can rnam pa mang po yang / /'dod pa'i 'dam las 'byin par 'gyur/ /theg chen la ni rab bkod nas/ /tshangs pa'i spyad la spyod du
337a2(mdo sde): btsud/ /brdzun du smra ba yongs spangs na/ /'phags pa'i dbang dang ye shes 'thob/ /rtag tu bden pa smra bar dga'/ /brdzun du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal 'jil/ /tshig gcig
337a3(mdo sde): tshad mar btsugs pas na/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong / /rdzun mi smra ba bsgoms pas na/ /byang chub chen po myur du 'thob/ /phra ma'i tshig smra yongs spangs na/ /dge
337a4(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong / /chad par lta bar yod mi 'gyur/ /'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba dang / /rin chen gter gyi gzungs
337a5(mdo sde): 'thob cing / /zab mo chos kyi rgya mtshor rig /myur du bla med byang chub 'thob/ /gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te/ /'jam zhing mnyen pa'i tshig smras na/ /sems can kun gyis
337a6(mdo sde): bkur bar 'gyur/ /snga ma'i mi dge las kyang zhi/ /'khor rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes/ /sa bcu
337a7(mdo sde): las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur/ /kyal bar smra ba yongs spangs na/ /mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed/ /gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun/ /yon tan rnam lnga 'thob par 'gyur/ /
337b1(mdo sde): rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing / /'phags pa'i lam tshol spro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing / /thams cad mkhyen pa myur du 'thob/ /gal te chags sems
337b2(mdo sde): yongs spangs te/ /'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing / /dur smrig gyon la mchod par byed/ /theg pa gsum gyi byang chub sgrub/ /rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye/ /ston pa'i gnas su gnas
337b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /bla med theg pa la zhon te/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob/ /gal te gnod sems yongs spangs te/ /gcig tu byams pa'i sems bsgoms na/ /mnyam par bzhag
337b4(mdo sde): pa'ang myur du 'thob/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul med par 'gyur/ /rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du skye/ /nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral/ /de la gnas na byang chub 'thob/ /gnod
337b5(mdo sde): sems thams cad spang bar bya/ /ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te/ /rnam dag dad pa'i sems bsgoms na/ /theg gsum ston la mos byed cing / /sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa
337b6(mdo sde): byed| |ngan song gsum las yongs thar te/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang phrad/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/ /ye shes mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /dge
337b7(mdo sde): ba bcu yi las lam gyis/ /byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs/ /snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams dang / /sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid che ba'i
338a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'dis/ /ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas/ /sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms/ /myur du byang chub chen po thob/ /'phags pa shin
338a2(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang /
338a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa de go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo
338a4(mdo sde): de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
338a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur
338a6(mdo sde): ro| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / bal glang dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / lus kyi yan lag dang /
338a7(mdo sde): rkang pa dang / lag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mgo dang / mig dang / rkang dang / klad rgyas dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / yul dang / srid dang /
338b1(mdo sde): bu dang | chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / khang khyim dang / zhing 'brog la sogs pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa de re re byed pa na lus dang / srog la mi lta zhing bdag gcig pu 'jig
338b2(mdo sde): rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i
338b3(mdo sde): phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /thabs mkhas pa dang / shes rab mchog bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po phan pa
338b4(mdo sde): dang | bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir sdig pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /gzhan las spag go snyam pa
338b5(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang / brlang ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / ser sna dang / zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin no/ /gang sbyin pa'i
338b6(mdo sde): dngos po che'ang rung / chung yang rung / chung du na zan changs gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na'ang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /nyan thos kyi
338b7(mdo sde): theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do/ /gang sbyin pa'i dngos po de
339a1(mdo sde): che'ang rung / chung yang rung / chung du na zan changs gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo zhing sbyin pa byin pa'i
339a2(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed
339a3(mdo sde): pa na 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
339a4(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /
339a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems med kyi/ bdag gi dbul ba de spong ba
339a6(mdo sde): dang | bdag sdug bsngal las thar ba dang / bdag bde ba thob par bya ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed de/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir
339a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa byin na ni byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbul phongs
339b1(mdo sde): pa spong ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir
339b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yin no/ /de lta bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
339b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing yongs su srung
339b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par spyod pa na 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog la sems mi chags te/ bdag nyid
339b5(mdo sde): dbang ba bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sems can kun la sbyin pa byed de/ sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i sems dang / bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad la ji mi snyam
339b6(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i sems dang / sems can thams
339b7(mdo sde): cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin pa byed do/ /de bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
340a1(mdo sde): cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
340a2(mdo sde): dang / srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te 'dod pa lnga la sems mi chags shing byams pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' sems
340a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga'ang ma spangs la byams pa dang /
340a4(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'ang med par sbyin pa byed na sbyin pa'i dngos po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa btang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan
340a5(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'ang ma yin pas sbyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ma yin no/ /de bas na 'jig rten gyi
340a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa lnga spangs te/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sbyin pa bya'o/ /gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga'ang ma spangs la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'ang med
340a7(mdo sde): par sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang mi bya la/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'ang ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga la chags pas sbyin pa byed
340b1(mdo sde): na bdag nyid kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal gyi cha cung zad kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur na sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa bsal ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
340b2(mdo sde): don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor lo ldan pa/ /mkhas pa bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas/ /'dod pa rnam lnga dag
340b3(mdo sde): ni spangs te/ /sems can kun la phan dang bde byed/ /sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi/ /rnam smin 'bras bu re phyir ma yin/ /sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang / /yang dag
340b4(mdo sde): bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang / /'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gnas na/ /'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas ma btab/ /ma nges pa yi tshogs la
340b5(mdo sde): gnas 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang / /'dod pa'i lnga la mi gnas pa ni/ /nyan thos dag dang rang rgyal ba yi/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/ /de
340b6(mdo sde): bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs la/ /rtag tu rnam dag sbyin pa byed cing / /sems can kun la bde ba byas na/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
340b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang
341a1(mdo sde): l dan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing nyan
341a2(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos
341a3(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
341a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / theg pa chen po
341a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zag pa zad pa'i chos dang / 'dus
341a6(mdo sde): byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang / gnyis su med pa'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus
341a7(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / ji skad thos pa rnams ci nus su gzungs su 'dzin cing yid la byed do/ /rab tu rtog go /mthar khong du chud par byed cing gzhan dag la'ang ci rigs par ston
341b1(mdo sde): par byed do/ /nam chos ston pa'i tshe na phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / ser sna med pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal med pa'i sems dang / rnyed pa mi re ba'i sems dang / gzhan mi
341b2(mdo sde): smod pa'i sems dang / bdag mi bstod pa'i sems dang / bsti stang dang bcas pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems
341b3(mdo sde): su bya'o| |nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni nyan thos kyi chos ston cing 'chad kyi/ de la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / rang sangs
341b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i gang zag
341b5(mdo sde): la ni theg pa chen po'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston
341b6(mdo sde): gyi| dbang po dang snod du ma gyur pa la chos mi ston to/ /gang theg pa chen po'i sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spyod cig bar ram/ nyan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig par mi skul
341b7(mdo sde): lo| |rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan byos shig ces skul ba'i skabs ni yod de/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi
342a1(mdo sde): sems can la skabs kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan gyis shig ces skul ba'i skabs kyang yod
342a2(mdo sde): de| de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos chung du na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshigs su bcad pa phyed tsam la'ang shin tu dad cing bkur sti byed kyi/ de la
342a3(mdo sde): 'phya'am/ skur ba'am/ bgegs sam/ bar chad mi byed de/ chos ston pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams la nad pa dang 'dra bar
342a4(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / gang 'chad pa'i chos la sman bzang po dang 'dra bar 'du shes shing 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bcad de re ba med pas dam pa'i chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/
342a5(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
342a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo de dang ldan na 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu
342a7(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod
342b1(mdo sde): pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mkhas pa chos
342b2(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa spyod pa dag / snod bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to/ /theg pa gzhan dag de la ston mi byed/ /thos nas de la 'phya zhing skur mi 'gyur/ /dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos
342b3(mdo sde): ston gyi/ /dbang po snod min dag la ma yin no/ /so sor ji ltar ci la mos pa bzhin/ /de dang de yi chos ston mgu bar byed/ /theg pa chen po spyod pa'i gang zag la/ /theg pa rnam pa gnyis
342b4(mdo sde): kyi chos mi bstan/ /bar bar theg pa gnyis kyi gang zag la/ /theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to/ /shin tu dad cing gus pas chos mnyan gyi/ /de la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o/ /
342b5(mdo sde): chos smra ba la mchod pa byed pa ni/ /sangs rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes bskyed/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nad bsal phyir/ /dam pa'i chos kyi sman dag nyan par bskul/ /khe dang
342b6(mdo sde): grags pa shin tu ring spangs te/ /dam pa'i chos dag bstan cing bshad par bya/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims rnam par
342b7(mdo sde): dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/
343a1(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por
343a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur/ de la ji ltar na tshul khrims
343a3(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ thun mong ba dang / thun mong ba ma
343a4(mdo sde): yin pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong pa zhe na/ gang khyim na gnas pa dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma'i tshul
343a5(mdo sde): khrims kyi sdom pa blangs pa'am/ yang na rab tu byung ba so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste/ sdom pa 'di dang / so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni byang chub
343a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
343a7(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa chod par ram/ log par lta ba sil bar ram/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / 'khor ba
343b1(mdo sde): las grol bar mi 'gyur te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes kyang mi bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
343b2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhe na/ gang byang chub
343b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / gnod pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis rnam par dag
343b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo / /tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo can rab 'bring
343b5(mdo sde): tha ma kun la bye brag mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / khyad par med pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo / /khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa
343b6(mdo sde): dang | khong khro ba med pa dang / ngan par spyod pa med pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo / /srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas
343b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo / /'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /gzugs med
344a1(mdo sde): pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i
344a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu thams cad la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /rnyed pa dang / mi rnyed pa la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / /'du byed rnams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung
344a3(mdo sde): ste| 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
344a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
344a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por
344a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
344a7(mdo sde): don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pa/ /rang byung so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims/ /theg pa gnyis
344b1(mdo sde): dang thun mong yin te/ /byang chub chen po zhes ni mi bya/ /mkhas pa stong pa nyid chos sgom pa/ /'jig rten kun la mi rten mi gnas/ /srid pa kun la gnas ma yin par/ /rnam par dag
344b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo / /mtshan ma spong ba'i tshul khrims dag ni/ /chags pa med de zag pa kun med/ /tshul khrims 'di lnga srung ba dag ni/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya//
344b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
344b4(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa| nyan thos dang / rang sangs
344b5(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed
344b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis te/ gang zhe na 'jig
344b7(mdo sde): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhe na/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ste/ sems can la dmigs
345a1(mdo sde): pa/ len pa dang bcas pa/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten te bzod par byed pa'o/ /gzhan
345a2(mdo sde): yang / bdag gi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la brten nas bzod par byed pa'o/ 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ji snyam pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / mthu
345a3(mdo sde): zhan pa'i bzod pa'i sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang / g.yo dang / sgyur bcas pa'i bzod pa dang / pha rol la 'drid pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i
345a4(mdo sde): don mi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ bzod pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang thun mong ma
345a5(mdo sde): yin gyi/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
345a6(mdo sde): nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa'i
345a7(mdo sde): bzod pa ste/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / bya ba'i dngos po
345b1(mdo sde): thams cad dang / tshig tu smra ba dang / rgyu dang / mtshan ma dang / yi ge dang / sgra skad thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa spyod do/ /bzod pa 'di bsgoms
345b2(mdo sde): pas kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang / bskal pa rnam gsum dang / mtshan nyid gsum dang / dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa
345b3(mdo sde): ba gsum dang / chu bo bzhi dang / mdud pa rnam bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / lus kyi mdud pa rnam bzhi la sogs pa yongs su bcad pas bzod pa 'di bsgom pa'i tshe sems
345b4(mdo sde): dang | yid rab tu zhi bas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
345b5(mdo sde): d pa' chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga rnams yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
345b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen
345b7(mdo sde): por 'gyur ba/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
346a1(mdo sde): kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ /mtshan mar bcas dang mtshan
346a2(mdo sde): ma med pa/ /mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzod pa chags yod/ /mkhas pa dag ni de la mi bstod/ /'du byed rnam gsum phung po khams dang / /skye mched la rten bzod pa sgom pa/
346a3(mdo sde): de ni zag bcas bzod pa yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin/ /phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi bsal nas/ /chags pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom zhing / /'du byed rnam
346a4(mdo sde): pa gsum dag zhe na/ /bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur/ /'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing / /rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs te/ /sems ni nam mkha' 'dra
346a5(mdo sde): bar mnyam pa/ /bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur/ /thams cad chos la ro gcig mthun par/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa zhi ba/ /sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi
346a6(mdo sde): chags/ /bzod pa 'di ni phan don cher 'gyur/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/
346a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
346b1(mdo sde): thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
346b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
346b3(mdo sde): dpa'i brtson 'grus la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus she na/ byang chub sems
346b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus gyis 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la nan tan byed do/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa
346b5(mdo sde): byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang / tshul khrims srung ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i las dang / bsgom pa'i bsod nams byed pa'i las so/ /las 'di dag byed pa ni brtson 'grus
346b6(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum zhes bya ste/ brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni sems can la dmigs pa zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu
346b7(mdo sde): bstan pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o/ /brtson 'grus 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
347a1(mdo sde): la sogs pa dang thun mong yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos
347a2(mdo sde): dang | rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'ang ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha
347a3(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs pa'i las dang
347a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste/ brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ zag pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ rten dang / gnas med de/ brtson
347a5(mdo sde): 'grus dang / le lo dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / tshul khrims dang / ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang / sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha
347a6(mdo sde): ma kun la mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / bye brag med pa'i 'du shes kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid
347a7(mdo sde): dang | dmigs pa med pas bya ba'i las byed de/ smra ba dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom
347b1(mdo sde): mo| |srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i
347b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / srid pa'i
347b3(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa kun la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'du byed rnams la mi gnas
347b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i
347b5(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor
347b6(mdo sde): lo zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa rnam
347b7(mdo sde): lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya
348a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen
348a2(mdo sde): bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ dbang po drug la shin tu chags
348a3(mdo sde): pa'i| |bus pa chu bo lngas ni khyer ba/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom yang / /mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smod 'gyur/ /sems can dmigs shing zag dang bcas
348a4(mdo sde): la| |len par bcas shing brtson 'grus rtsom na/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin/ /mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa dag
348a5(mdo sde): ni| |chags pa thams cad ring du spangs te/ /sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags/ /yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya/ /ming dang gzugs la chags pa med cing / /
348a6(mdo sde): phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te/ /thams cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ 'jig rten spyod kyang chu zla bzhin te/ /'bad pa'i brtson
348a7(mdo sde): 'grus rtsom pa'i mthar phyin/ /'khor lo 'di yis yongs su bcom pa/ /skye bo kun nas nyon mongs bcings pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
348b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa
348b2(mdo sde): lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba
348b3(mdo sde): dang | nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi go cha chen
348b4(mdo sde): po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub
348b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam gtan gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa
348b6(mdo sde): pa dang / skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam
348b7(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par grol ba gsum la
349a1(mdo sde): gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas nas
349a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga la gnas nas
349a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang
349a4(mdo sde): sa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi
349a5(mdo sde): khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom
349a6(mdo sde): pa dang / bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang
349a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
349b1(mdo sde): gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la gnas nas bsam
349b2(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung du la gnas nas bsam
349b3(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan de dag ni zag pa dang
349b4(mdo sde): bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o/ /bsam gtan 'di ni
349b5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba zhes bya ste/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang /
349b6(mdo sde): rang sang rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/ 'di lta te/
349b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
350a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
350a2(mdo sde): dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye
350a3(mdo sde): bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam
350a4(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar bsam
350a5(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams dang
350a6(mdo sde): bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang bral
350a7(mdo sde): bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal
350b1(mdo sde): du tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
350b2(mdo sde): mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
350b3(mdo sde): pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol dang bral bar
350b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung du dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa dang bral bar
350b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po skyed pa/ zag pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
350b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor
350b7(mdo sde): lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
351a1(mdo sde): las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
351a2(mdo sde): pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad
351a3(mdo sde): de bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi khur lci spong ba'i phyir ni/ /dmigs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te/ /bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod/ /yang dag mkhas pa'i
351a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ma yin/ /snod la rten cing rtog dang bcas pa/ /rnam par grol 'dod ting 'dzin sgom yang / /tshul rol pha rol mu la gnas na/ /sems can dag la phan don byed min/
351a5(mdo sde): sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir/ /ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci spongs te/ /kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba/ /de ni yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid/ /sems can
351a6(mdo sde): thams cad sim par byed phyir/ /mi gnas pa yi ting 'dzin sgom ste/ /'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod pa/ /de ni blo gros chen po zhes bya/ /srid bas bcings pa thams cad
351a7(mdo sde): bkrol te/ /'jigs pa med pa'i grong du bzung phyir/ /rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sgom pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o// //bam po bcu pa ste tha ma/ rigs
351b1(mdo sde): kyi bu| gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor
351b2(mdo sde): lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sang rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang
351b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur
351b4(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang /
351b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos
351b6(mdo sde): klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / nyan pa dang / pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' zhig la rten te/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel
351b7(mdo sde): bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi sgron ma dbyung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la shin tu 'bad pa'i
352a1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i
352a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs
352a3(mdo sde): bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan du spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang
352a4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la'ang rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson
352a5(mdo sde): 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa ste/ 'phags pa'i zag pa med pa'i lam gyi yan lag tshol ba ma yin/ /'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i
352a6(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba tshol ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed pa ma yin te/ rtag tu lta ba dang bcas pa/ shes rab dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan
352a7(mdo sde): tan byed do/ /de ltar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o/ /shes rab de ni nyan thos dang /
352b1(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang
352b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab che na/ 'di lta te/ byang chub sems
352b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa ni ci nus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du
352b4(mdo sde): 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad kyang de la dmigs su med pa'i sbyor ba la gnas te/ mi g.yo ba dang / mi rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / nam mkha' lta
352b5(mdo sde): bu'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa'i shes rab dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / skye ba dang / 'gog pa med pa'i sems dang / phyir mi
352b6(mdo sde): ldog pa'i sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang / bdag med pa'i sems
352b7(mdo sde): dang | rnam par mi rtogs pa'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / bzod pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sa la shin tu thabs mkhas pas bde
353a1(mdo sde): bar gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo gros kyi sa la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste/ shes rab 'di ni len pa med pa
353a2(mdo sde): la chags pa med pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
353a3(mdo sde): po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /
353a4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang /
353a5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'i
353a6(mdo sde): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan
353a7(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang
353b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs
353b2(mdo sde): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas
353b3(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam/ gzhan gyi don nam/ gnyis ka'i don la bdag dang / gzhan du rtog cing bzo dang / sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs
353b4(mdo sde): kyis bdag dang / gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos la mchod pa dang / bsnyen
353b5(mdo sde): bkur byed pa dang / pha dang / ma dang / nad pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang / rten med pa dang / gnod pa mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong na shin tu thabs mkhas pas
353b6(mdo sde): sgrol zhing bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams zhes sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag theg pa chen po la gnas pas nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs
353b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma smin pa la shin tu phra ba zab pa dam pa'i chos ston te/ slob tu gzhug pa
354a1(mdo sde): dang | 'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan du byed du gzhug go / gzhan yang / don dam pa'i bden pa bstan te nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / phyin ci
354a2(mdo sde): log bzhi las bzla zhing mi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/ gzhan yang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
354a3(mdo sde): bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
354a4(mdo sde): brgyad pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par byed do/ /
354a5(mdo sde): sems can gang khe dang / grags pa dang / longs spyod la chags te dbang po rgod pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa la ni mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo klog pa dang /
354a6(mdo sde): 'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang / sangs rgyas gzhan gyis bshad pa las gzhan pa rnam par grol ba dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste yongs su smin par byed
354a7(mdo sde): do| |sems can gang sbyin pa byed pa la mi mos pa la ni nor rin po che dang / nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar bskul bas yongs su smin par byed do/ /sems can gang gtum pa
354b1(mdo sde): mi des pa'i rang bzhin can tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi slob tu skul ba dang / sems can gang zhe sdang can la bzod pa slob par skul ba dang / sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'grus
354b2(mdo sde): slob tu skul ba dang / sems can gang sems g.yeng ba la ni bsam gtan sgom par skul ba dang / sems can gang 'chal ba'i shes rab can la ni yang dag pa'i chos ston pas
354b3(mdo sde): bka' lung brda sprod cing lung 'bogs pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su smin par byed do/ /sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing mi gnas pa dang / mi spyod
354b4(mdo sde): pa can la ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa la bslab pa dang / bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa la bslab pas
354b5(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed do/ /gzhan yang / bzo dang / sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas la slob cing spyod du btsud pas de yongs su smin par byed do/ /de la sogs pa byang chub sems
354b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pas ye shes kyi rnam pa ni chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo / /de ltar yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / bzo dang /
354b7(mdo sde): sgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang / ston pa gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul
355a1(mdo sde): ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba
355a2(mdo sde): yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub pas rtog pa med pa'i phyir
355a3(mdo sde): ldog pa med pa'i chos su gyur pa'o/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ston pa mkhas pa la'ang mi rten/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos par 'jig
355a4(mdo sde): rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la nan tan byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni 'jig rten las
355a5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang mi nus la/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ /shin tu thabs mi
355a6(mdo sde): mkhas pas sems can gyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i khyad par yang mi shes la/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa la'ang rmongs par gyur pas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
355a7(mdo sde): kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i dbang por ma smin pa dag la theg pa chen po ston pa dang / slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go /gang theg
355b1(mdo sde): pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed
355b2(mdo sde): du bcug go / gang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go /
355b3(mdo sde): gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'khor ba'i chos la bde ba dang / dga' bar ston te/ 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par mi ston to/ /gzhan yang /
355b4(mdo sde): shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' ba nas de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la ni shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston
355b5(mdo sde): te| de la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye zhing sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong ba la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spong ba mi ston
355b6(mdo sde): to| |gzhan yang / shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang tshul khrims srung bar mos pa la ni sbyin pa spyod du 'jug go /sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la
355b7(mdo sde): ni bzod pa spong ba ston cing tshul khrims srung du 'jug go / sems can gang brtson 'grus rtsom par mos pa la ni brtson 'grus spong ba ston cing bzod pa spyod du 'jug go /sems can gang
356a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spong ba ston cing brtson 'grus la nan tan byed du bcug go / sems can gang shes rab sgom
356a2(mdo sde): par mos pa la ni shes rab spong ba ston cing bsam gtan sgom du 'jug go / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba
356a3(mdo sde): bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed nus te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to/ /thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa/
356a4(mdo sde): chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
356a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong pa yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
356a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
356a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/ gzhan gyi don lhur byed pas bzo dang / sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs
356b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / pha dang / ma la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / nad pa dang / phongs pa
356b2(mdo sde): nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang / skyabs med pa dang / shin tu sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos gzir ba la thabs kyis sgrol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs
356b3(mdo sde): su smin par byed do/ /ci la mos pa dang / dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos ston to/ /gzhan yang / rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas
356b4(mdo sde): kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni theg pa chen po slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang / gal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
356b5(mdo sde): kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi chos kyis skye ba ston cing 'khor bas skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar skul lo/ /sems can gang srog gcod
356b6(mdo sde): pa la mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du chags pa la ni dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'di shi 'phos nas pha rol
356b7(mdo sde): tu skye ba 'di dang / pha rol gyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong bar ston te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kyis 'jigs pa dang / skyo ba ston to/ /kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i
357a1(mdo sde): chos ston to/ /kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to/ /kha cig la ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i chos yang dag par bstan te khad
357a2(mdo sde): kyis slob tu 'jug go / sems can gang sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur ba rnams la ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung bar bstan pa de bzhin du rgyas par sems can gang
357a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan la mos par 'gyur ba la ni zag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang / shes rab bla na med pa ston cing nan tan byed du bcug ste/ shin tu thabs
357a4(mdo sde): mkhas pas 'di ni dmigs pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes
357a5(mdo sde): bya'o| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa
357a6(mdo sde): rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /
357a7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen
357b1(mdo sde): bkur bya ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ shes rab nan tan rnam gnyis te/ /'jig rten bcas dang
357b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'das/ /chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas/ /chags med pa ni 'jig rten 'das/ /shin tu thabs mkhas nan tan ni/ /khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas/ /dmigs pa
357b3(mdo sde): yod pa 'jig rten bcas/ /dmigs med de ni 'jig rten 'das/ /gang zhig theg pa gcig ston pa/ /de ni legs par chos ston min/ /bdag kyang yongs su mi smin na/ /gzhan gyi don
357b4(mdo sde): du ga la 'gyur/ /gcig tu mi dge sems can la/ /theg pa gsum gyi chos ston na/ /de ni gti mug rmongs pa ste/ /byang chub chen po de ma yin/ /theg pa gsum la 'jug spro zhing / /
357b5(mdo sde): yang dag pa yi chos 'dod la/ /'khor bas spro ba'i chos ston na/ /mkhas pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin/ /rtse gcig blo yis rab brtags te/ /'dod dang mos pa bzhin du ston/ /'di
357b6(mdo sde): ni shin tu thabs mkhas pas/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi de la bsngags/ /sems can sdig pa dag spyod cing / /theg pa gsum gyi snod 'gyur na/ /dbang po'i snod bzhin chos bstan te//
357b7(mdo sde): sdig pa kun las grol bar byed/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod do/ /byang chub sems
358a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
358a2(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
358a3(mdo sde): pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
358a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa'o/ /chos la dmigs pa'i byams
358a5(mdo sde): pa ni| byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni/ byams pa chen po'i go cha zhes mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
358a6(mdo sde): can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi
358a7(mdo sde): phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa la nan tan byed pa'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni bdag zhi ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bdag gi sgrib pa
358b1(mdo sde): bsal ba dang / bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa gcad pa'i phyir yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pas brtson 'grus la nan tan byed pa
358b2(mdo sde): nam yin no/ /de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes mi bya ste/ go cha chen po ma yin no/ /chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
358b3(mdo sde): dang thun mong ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' zhig gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
358b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa 'di la nan tan byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
358b5(mdo sde): chen po ni sems can thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis
358b6(mdo sde): chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed do/ /de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs
358b7(mdo sde): pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni phung po la mi gnas/ skye mched la mi gnas/ khams la mi gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa nas byang chub kyi lam gyi
359a1(mdo sde): yan lag gi bar du mi gnas so/ /'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/
359a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas/ tshu rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ pha rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ dmigs pa la mi gnas/ mi dmigs pa la mi gnas
359a3(mdo sde): te| de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las shin tu 'das te/ de ni
359a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byams
359a5(mdo sde): pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin
359a6(mdo sde): tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /
359a7(mdo sde): srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang ni
359b1(mdo sde): rang rgyal ba/ /sems can dmigs pa'i byams sgom pa/ /sems la bcu gsum skyen 'chang zhing / /bdag la phan pa'i don phyir rtsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni/ /sems
359b2(mdo sde): can thams cad kun gyi phyir/ /thun mong ma yin byams chen bsgoms/ /bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs/ /dri ma bcu gsum rab spangs nas/ /byang chub chen por gzhol bar
359b3(mdo sde): byed| |chos la dmigs pa'i byams bsgoms na/ /bsod nams zhing grub ring ba min/ /bcu gsum stobs la bder gnas na/ /sems can kun las shin tu 'phags/ /ji ltar
359b4(mdo sde): seng ge'i rgyal po de/ /ri dwags kun las 'phags pa bzhin/ /bcu gsum dgra rnams shin tu btul/ /rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin spangs/ /sems la cis kyang mi gos na/ /myur
359b5(mdo sde): du byang chub chen po 'thob/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
359b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas nyan
359b7(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba
360a1(mdo sde): dang | bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ji ltar zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don
360a2(mdo sde): gyi phyir snying rje la spyod kyi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag
360a3(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed do/ /de bas
360a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
360a5(mdo sde): cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur
360a6(mdo sde): ro| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed
360a7(mdo sde): do| |snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pas yongs su sdud pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / theg pa dang
360b1(mdo sde): bran dang / las byed pa'i mi dang / yul dang / srid dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / lus dang / srog gi bar du yongs su gtong ba la ser sna med de/ mi dmigs pa'i spyod ba la sbyor bas
360b2(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can yod par mi mthong / sbyin pa byed par mi mthong / len par mi mthong / nor gyi dngos por mi mthong / sbyin pa spyod par mi mthong / sbyin pa byas pa'i 'bras bur
360b3(mdo sde): mi mthong ba nas mi dmigs pa'i bar du'ang mi mthong ste/ de lta bu'i snying rje chen po skyed do/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir ngag snyan pa dang / don sgrub pa
360b4(mdo sde): dang | don mthun pas ci dang / cis 'dul ba bzhin du mi dmigs pa'ang mi mthong ba'i bar du de dang / des rgyas par ston cing 'chad do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
360b5(mdo sde): pos rtag tu mchog dam pa'i dul ba'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / tshad med pa'i sems dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad la mngon par 'du mi
360b6(mdo sde): byed pa'i sems kyis gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba med pa dang / mi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin
360b7(mdo sde): par byed pa la skyo ba med do/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma yin
361a1(mdo sde): no| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas
361a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang /
361a3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur
361a4(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ shin tu zab mo dam pa'i chos dag /snying rje chen
361a5(mdo sde): po'i gzhi ru de 'gyur/ /shin tu dpag dka' nam mkha' 'dra ste/ /gnas pa med de gzugs kyang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po/ /yon tan chen po dang ni
361a6(mdo sde): ldan te/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes snying rje chen pos/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten 'da' bar des 'gyur/ /mgon dang skyabs med sems can dag ni/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnyog pas
361a7(mdo sde): bcings pa/ /snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te/ /sems can rnam par grol bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje bskyed pas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed de
361b1(mdo sde): nyan thos theg pa'i 'khor rnams dang ni/ /rang rgyal theg pa spyod pas ma yin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems can/ /ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba/ /snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus
361b2(mdo sde): te| |sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam
361b3(mdo sde): pa| tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen
361b4(mdo sde): po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/
361b5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang
361b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so
361b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
362a1(mdo sde): dang | gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad
362a2(mdo sde): la shin tu rtog pa ni ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du/ sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ rten pa med pa/ mi gnas pa
362a3(mdo sde): gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi
362a4(mdo sde): 'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par zhen pa dang bral ba/ sems kyi spyod pa med pa las mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba rnam gsum skyes te/ bde ba dang /
362a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal dang / bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rab tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
362a6(mdo sde): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te
362a7(mdo sde): reg pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te
362b1(mdo sde): reg pa'i bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/ /sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa las
362b2(mdo sde): skyes pa'i tshor ba rnam gsum ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/ /dus gsum gyi phung
362b3(mdo sde): po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad la len pa med pa/ sems kyi spyod pa med pa'o/ /gang ji snyed khams gsum dang / 'du byed gsum dang / reg bya gsum
362b4(mdo sde): dang | tshor ba gsum dang / dbang po gsum dang / theg pa gsum dang / sdom pa gsum dang / rnam par grol ba gsum dang / rnam pa de dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba/ gnas
362b5(mdo sde): med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ len pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas so/ /gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
362b6(mdo sde): rab dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhin dang / rdzu 'phrul
362b7(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas
363a1(mdo sde): so| |gang ji snyed dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la'ang sems kyis spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /gzhan yang / mngon par
363a2(mdo sde): 'du byed pa gsum dang / chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / lam gyi yan lag dang / lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la'ang len pa med pa/ sems kyi spyod pa
363a3(mdo sde): med pa/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang / nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa
363a4(mdo sde): dang | zag pa med pa dang / tshu rol gyi mu dang / pha rol gyi mu dang / chung du dang / chen po dang / tshad med pa dang / byed pa dang / mi byed pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba
363a5(mdo sde): dang | lung du mi ston pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
363a6(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas srung bar bya ba med pa gsum dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du
363a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa/ sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis
363b1(mdo sde): tshor ba rnam gsum gyi nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zhi ba dang / mtshan ma'i chos thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / ji
363b2(mdo sde): snyed nam mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang 'dren par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
363b3(mdo sde): lo de la gnas pas gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor
363b4(mdo sde): ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bsal te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed do/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ mun pa nag pos nam mkha'
363b5(mdo sde): thams cad yog pa na nyi ma shar ba'i tshe mun pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'ang tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam
363b6(mdo sde): pa| tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu
363b7(mdo sde): brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / nam mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs
364a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas pa dpag tu med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun pa yongs su bsal te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /
364a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang / srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad
364a3(mdo sde): lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar mi byed do/ /gzhan yang / de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang / phyir
364a4(mdo sde): mi ldog par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing rjes su mi spyod pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos
364a5(mdo sde): kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / yon tan thams
364a6(mdo sde): cad la sems mi ngoms pa nas byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad de/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung du na rmi lam du'ang bar chad med par 'gyur ro/ /
364a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshigs so so yang dag par rig pas nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas
364b1(mdo sde): pa| yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i
364b2(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nam mkha'
364b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
364b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum po yongs su bcad de/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang / g.yo ba'i sems kyi spyod pa
364b5(mdo sde): med pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / rig pa dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na zhag gcig
364b6(mdo sde): gam| zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin de las langs na'ang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing / lhan ner gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
364b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog go /ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sems rab tu mnyam pas nam mkha' ltar
365a1(mdo sde): chags pa med pa dang / lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zil dngar gyi thigs pa skar ma snar ma lta bu mngon par byung bas kun nas nyon mongs pas
365a2(mdo sde): bcings pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste/ dga' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab
365a3(mdo sde): par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'jug pa nas lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu bde ba myong
365a4(mdo sde): ba bzhin de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde bas reg pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan
365a5(mdo sde): ma gzhan mthong ba med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gcig yid la byas na sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo / /gal te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na
365a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngo / /gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chung bar yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chung dur mthong ngo / /gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por yid la byas na
365a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong ngo / /gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par mthong ngo / /gal te bdag gi lus sangs
365b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na bdag gi lus de sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo / /gal te gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur
365b2(mdo sde): yid la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun su mtshogs par mthong ngo / /gal te sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs
365b3(mdo sde): su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams
365b4(mdo sde): cad sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong gi gzugs gzhan du mi mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe'ang 'di snyam du chos thams cad
365b5(mdo sde): dang | gzugs thams cad ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad lhag ma ma
365b6(mdo sde): lus par yongs su gcad do snyam nas 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas blo sngon du btang ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su
