464a3(mdo sde): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de nyid de'i bla na med pa
464a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gi mdun du pad+ma kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma yod pa/ kha dog dpag tu med pa/ 'dab
464a5(mdo sde): ma bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa so sor byung ngo / /de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ pad+ma de
464a6(mdo sde): dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par gtor nas kyang / tshig 'di skad du/ bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar bstan par bgyi'o/ /
464a7(mdo sde): de ltar rab tu dbye bar bgyi'o zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas sil snyan thams
464b1(mdo sde): cad kyang ma bkrol bar sgra byung ngo / /spos thams cad kyi ngad kyang langs so/ /lha brgya stong mang po dag gis kyang lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dzam+bu'i gling gi gser phye dang / lha'i me tog man+dA
464b2(mdo sde): ra ba dang / lha'i na bza' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ de bzhin gshegs
464b3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
464b4(mdo sde): pa| kun dga' bo/ 'khor bzhi po 'di dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za gang dag chos kyis rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag phyi ma'i dus na thos
464b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang ji ltar da lta na nga ston pa de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lhag chad med par ston par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
464b6(mdo sde): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la yi rangs
464b7(mdo sde): te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ni
465a1(mdo sde): wa rma dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sa mA d+hi tsakra nA ma mahA
465a2(mdo sde): yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di
465a3(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems
465a4(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i 'khor sna tshogs pas bskor nas chos
465a5(mdo sde): ston par gyur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing
465a6(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /snang ba chen pos kyang thams cad gsal bar gyur te/ de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
465a7(mdo sde): pa 'dug par gyur te/ stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ bcom
465b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ shin tu ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' shes sam/
465b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang na 'dug /
465b3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gang na ma mchis pa de na mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang na med pa de gang yin/ gsol pa/
465b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ yul thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sgom pa gang yin/ bcom ldan 'das/ sgom pa ni sgom pa ma mchis pa'i don to/ /'jam
465b5(mdo sde): dpal gyis gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar ston par mdzad/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ nga ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang / skye ba med par chos ston to/ /
465b6(mdo sde): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang / skye ba med par chos ston to/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par 'jig pa
465b7(mdo sde): med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /ngas ni 'di ltar chos gang yang ma bshig /ma bskyed pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gsungs so/ /
466a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings
466a2(mdo sde): shes sam/ gsol pa/ gal te bdag gis dmigs na 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis 'jig rten gang la spyod pa shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom
466a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ 'jig rten na sgyu ma sprul pa'i mi gang kho na la spyod pa de la spyod pas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags
466a4(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos gsan par ni bzhed kyi/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /gsol pa/ ci las brtsams te spobs
466a5(mdo sde): par bgyid pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod chos kyi dbyings las rtsoms shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang bdag gis chos kyi dbyings ma lags
466a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams rab tu skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
466a7(mdo sde): 'das/ gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par gyur na/ de'i slad du mngon pa'i nga rgyal kyang skrag par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mngon
466b1(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal can gnyis gcig cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod ni rdo rje'i gzhi yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom
466b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ chos thams cad mi phyed cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas na rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bgyi na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma
466b3(mdo sde): mchis pa'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lags pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' ni ma mchis pa lags te/ de lta bu'i mtha' gang lags
466b4(mdo sde): pa de ni tshur mchi ba dang / phar mchi ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bu'i mtha' can gyi don la gnas nas rang bzhin med pa'i don sgom par byed do/ /dben pa sten
466b5(mdo sde): par yang byed do/ /'du 'dzi spong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis chos bstan pa
466b6(mdo sde): ni rab tu ngo mtshar to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ ngo mtshar mi che ste/ dgra bcom pa zag pa med pa ni chos ston pa'i snod ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
466b7(mdo sde): ltar chos bstan pa 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs
467a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni chos dmigs pa'i phyir yang zhugs pa ma yin no/ /'di ni gang du'ang zhugs pa dang / ldog pa med
467a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci la bsams te smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ dgra bcom pa nyid
467a3(mdo sde): ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad pa yin na de dag gang gi snod yin zhing de gang ji lta bu zhig gi snod du 'gyur snyam ste/ de las bsams nas dgra bcom
467a4(mdo sde): pa| zag pa zad pa/ chos bstan pa'i snod ma yin par kho bo de skad smra'o/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba med pa'i chos yin par mos sam/ smras pa/ 'jam
467a5(mdo sde): dpal/ bdag mos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ legs so/ /legs so/ /chos zab mo'i don la khyod rab
467a6(mdo sde): tu mkhas par bsngags gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
467a7(mdo sde): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo
467b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI la d+harma dang / ban+de rnam par mi rtog pas rgya las bsgyur ba/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pa ri Na ta tsakra nA
467b2(mdo sde): ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
467b3(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i ri'i zom la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
467b4(mdo sde): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rin po che la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub chen po don du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang / sems
467b5(mdo sde): can thams cad sgrol bar 'dod cing byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa 'dzin par 'dod pa dang / byang chub chen por sems bskyed cing snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
467b6(mdo sde): cad la rim gro dang / bkur sti byed 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yangs shing rgya che ba gsog par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub
467b7(mdo sde): par 'dod pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rol par 'dod pa dang / nam mkha' la bang ba dang /
468a1(mdo sde): mdzod chen po bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / rang gi lag nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du gtor zhing 'bul bar 'dod pas/ 'di skad ces brjod par
468a2(mdo sde): bya ste/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams
468a3(mdo sde): bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dag pa'i lam la bde bar gnas pa ma thob bas deng byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bdag gi lus dang / sems 'di
468a4(mdo sde): dus thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad du dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag lus 'bul gyi/ mthu chen po mnga' ba'i
468a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sa chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag bzhes su gsol/ bdag gi bsod nams dang / ye shes
468a6(mdo sde): kyi tshogs chen po dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sems kyi rgya bskyed pa dang / rab tu zhi zhing dul ba dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la
468a7(mdo sde): sogs pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / yang bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'khor
468b1(mdo sde): ba na 'khor zhing bcing pa chen pos bcings par gyur pa/ btson ra na gnas pa/ yang dag pa'i lam dang bral pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dbang du gyur pa/ mgon med pa/ skyabs
468b2(mdo sde): med pa/ mig med pa/ rten med pa/ gtso bo med pa/ 'dren pa med par gyur pa/ lam gol bar song ba/ 'khor ba la gzhol ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la rgyab kyis phyogs
468b3(mdo sde): pa| ngan 'gro la phyogs pa/ lam ngan pa la bsten pa/ lam ngan par lhung bar gyur pa/ rtag tu bshes gnyen ngan pas zin cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ yang dag pa
468b4(mdo sde): dang | yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / phan par 'gyur ba dang / phan pa med pa dang / don yod pa dang / don med pa la rmongs bar gyur pa/ dge ba'i chos dang bral shing mi dge ba chen po bsgrubs
468b5(mdo sde): pa| sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa rnams la rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing mi bde ba chen po bsgrubs pa/
468b6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa/ bag tsha ba med pa/ sems rtag tu g.yeng bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / zhi zhing dben pa dang / sgrub pa dang / bag yod pa dang bral bar gyur pa/ gzungs
468b7(mdo sde): dang | ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sa bcu'i chos kyi bzod pa la bde bar gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa zab mo dang mnyam pa nyid las ring du gyur pa/ byams pa dang / snying
469a1(mdo sde): rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi mi sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan par gyur pa dang / chags pa
469a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes chen po las ring du gyur pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la bde bar gnas pa ma thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang /
469a3(mdo sde): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa la mi gnas pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid la spyod cing gzhol bar 'jug pa mi 'grub
469a4(mdo sde): pa dang / bsod nams byed pa la g.yel zhing lta ba snyems pa dang / the tshom gyi sgrib pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mngon par mi rtogs pa dang / de bzhin du 'phags pa'i
469a5(mdo sde): lam yan lag brgyad mi sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa brgya stong tshad med pas zil gyis non cing sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos sdug bsngal zhing yongs su mnar te/ rtag tu
469a6(mdo sde): gdung ba bsam bzhin pas khro zhing rtag tu g.yeng pa/ nyon mongs pa brgya stong la rgyun du gzhol bar gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje
469a7(mdo sde): chen po la gnas pa rnams kyis bdag gi skyabs mdzad par gsol/ bdag gi rten mdzad par gsol/ bdag gi 'dren pa mdzad par gsol/ bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag
469b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs gsog pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /bdag myur
469b2(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / ting
469b3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par grol ba'i yon tan dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /yang bdag bsod nams phun sum
469b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig / mchod pa rgya chen po byed pa'i dus su'ang / 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po mnga' ba thams cad
469b5(mdo sde): dang | byang chub sems dpa' tshogs thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ deng bdag sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro chen po bgyis te
469b6(mdo sde): lus 'bul lo/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji snyed rgyan dang / yo byad bzang po thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang /
469b7(mdo sde): rin po che'i shing dang / rin po che'i ri dang / rin po che'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i dkyil 'khor dang / rin po che'i dbyig rnam par bkram pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
470a1(mdo sde): dang | rin po che'i do shal gyi rgyan dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba dang / rin po che'i gling dag na nor bu rin
470a2(mdo sde): po che chen po rnam par dag pa'i mar me'i sdong bu dang / rin po che dril bu'i sgra 'khrol ba la nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba gser btso ma'i sbar khab can gyi dom dom pho long dpyangs pas
470a3(mdo sde): yongs su khebs pa/ gser btso ma'i me tog dzam+bu'i gser gyi ze ba can/ gser gyi shing ljon pas dkris pa/ gser gyi pho brang sna tshogs rin po che'i sprin chags pa/ rin po che'i
470a4(mdo sde): thigs pa char du 'bab pa/ rin po che rnam pa mang po'i mdzod kyi pho brang / lha rdzas kyi nor bus rtsig ngos spras pa/ rin po che'i shing thams cad rig 'dzin chen po'i skyed mos tshal
470a5(mdo sde): gyi ra ba yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che'i pho brang dang / gnas dang / shing dang / nags tshal la sogs pa thams cad kyang yid du 'ong ba de lta bu bdag po med pa/ 'dzin pa med pa/ thams
470a6(mdo sde): cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing dbul lo/ /dzam+bu'i gling na sman bzang po ring du 'tsho bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa
470a7(mdo sde): dang | nor bu rin po che sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba dang / ma g.yos par rang bzhin gyis bda' ba'i zhal zas bzang po dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
470b1(mdo sde): tsan+dan gyi shing dang / a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dmar po dang / lo ma che zhing me tog rtag par bsung gis gzi bar byed pa'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i lha rdzas kyi spos ma bzung
470b2(mdo sde): yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dpag bsam gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la sogs pa
470b3(mdo sde): dang | ri rab lhun po dang / ri ti se dang / spos kyi ri dang / ri ma la ya dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri ma ha la dang / rdo rje'i ri la sogs te ri chen po rnam pa de dag gi rin po che'i zom sna tshogs
470b4(mdo sde): dang | rin po che'i stegs dang / rdo ba rin po che dang / rin po che'i phug dang / rin po che'i pho brang dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i zhogs ma dang / rin po che'i lam srang mang po dang /
470b5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i ka ba mang po dang / rin po che'i sgron me'i 'khor lo mang po dang / bai DUR+ya la sogs te/ nor bu'i rigs rnam pa mang po dang / ji tsam du gnam gyi steng na bdag po med pa'i
470b6(mdo sde): lha'i pho brang dang / lha'i nor rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong zhing blta bar 'os pa dang / lha'i rol mo'i yo byad rnam pa mang po rlung gi ngad kyis bskyod pa tsam gyis sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang /
470b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' la gnas pa'i pho brang nas rol mo'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang / lha'i rol mo rnam pa mang po ma bskyod par sgra snyan par 'byin pa dang / lha'i bya sna tshogs nam mkha'i pho brang
471a1(mdo sde): nas snyan pa'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang / rin po che'i sprin sna tshogs las sgra snyan pa chen po 'byung ba dang / lha'i nor bu rin po che dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
471a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang lha'i dri'i shing dang / me tog gi shing mang po dang / phreng ba'i shing dang / byug pa mang po dang / bdug pa'i spos kyi shing dang / sgron ma'i shing dang / rgyal mtshan gyi shing dang /
471a3(mdo sde): ba dan gyi shing dang / rin po che'i shing la sogs pa de dag thams cad ma bzung ba/ yongs su ma bzung ba de dag thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
471a4(mdo sde): la dbul lo/ /ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na mchod pa'i sprin chen po me tog gi sprin dang / spos kyi sprin dang /
471a5(mdo sde): phreng ba'i sprin dang / bdug spos kyi sprin dang / byug spos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin
471a6(mdo sde): dang | rin po che'i gos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i rnam pa'i sprin dang / rin po che'i phung po'i sprin la sogs te/ rin po che chen po'i sprin rnam pa de dag dang / gzhan yang / spos kyi 'bru mar
471a7(mdo sde): gyis mar me'i snod chen po bkang ba stong gi 'jig rten gyi tshad dang mnyam pa/ mar me'i snying po ri rab kyi tshad tsam pa sgron mar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad
471b1(mdo sde): dang | byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la mchod cing dbul lo/ /de bzhin du mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams dam pa ji tsam pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs
471b2(mdo sde): su bsngo'o/ /gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dge ba mang po brtsams te/ dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsod
471b3(mdo sde): nams de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos
471b4(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo chen po ni bskor/ bdud kyi sde rnams ni pham par byas nas/ mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par dgongs pa la/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bskal pa chen
471b5(mdo sde): po gcig tshang bar bzhugs par gsol zhes gsol ba gdab bo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis bsod nams ci bsgrubs pa de dag
471b6(mdo sde): thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo / /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdig pa dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bshegs pa de bzhin du
471b7(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang yongs su bshags shing yongs su sbyong ngo / /de bzhin du mchod pa dang / bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du
472a1(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i spyan sngar gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM sam b+ha ra/ sam b+ha ra/ b+hi ma na sa ra/ mahA dzA bA hUM/ gang gsang sngags de bzlas pas ci dang / ci
472a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa de thams cad 'grub cing lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin
472a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa yid la byed cing nyin mo'ang rung / mtshan mo'ang rung / yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo chen po 'di klog cing 'don na/ de'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'byang zhing nyon mongs pa thams
472a4(mdo sde): cad khad kyis sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs snga ma de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig bklags pa tsam gyis kyang tshangs pa brgya'i dpal dang ldan zhing rmi
472a5(mdo sde): lam na'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'das nas kyang yongs su dag pa'i zhing du skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
472a6(mdo sde): tshogs mang po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //li'i
472a7(mdo sde): dge slong sde snod gsum dang ldan pa shI la d+harmas rgya gar gyi d+harma rgya'i yi ge las ban+de rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur ba/ / //
